trans-unit.source: If leftBounds is not specified in the dictionary, the default value used is [0.0, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0].
trans-unit.target: 如果未在字典中指定 leftBounds ，则使用的默认值为 [0.0, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0] 0.0，0.0，0.5，1.0 ]。

trans-unit.source: If leftBounds is not specified in the dictionary, the default value used is [0.5, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0].
trans-unit.target: 如果未在字典中指定 leftBounds ，则使用的默认值为 [0.5, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0] 0.5，0.0，0.5，1.0 ]。

trans-unit.source: If mode is not one of the accepted values, a gl.INVALID_ENUM error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 mode 不是可接受的值之一， gl.INVALID_ENUM 引发gl.INVALID_ENUM错误。

trans-unit.source: If newTrack was omitted or was null, replaceTrack() simply stops the sender. No negotiation is required in this case.
trans-unit.target: 如果 newTrack 被省略或为 null ，则 replaceTrack() 只是停止发送者。在这种情况下，无需协商。

trans-unit.source: If offset is a valid multiple of the size of the given type, a gl.INVALID_OPERATION error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 offset 是给定类型的大小的有效倍数， gl.INVALID_OPERATION 引发gl.INVALID_OPERATION错误。

trans-unit.source: If offset is not a valid multiple of the size of the given type, a gl.INVALID_OPERATION error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 offset 不是给定类型大小的有效倍数，则会引发 gl.INVALID_OPERATION 错误。

trans-unit.source: If playbackRate is negative, the media is played backwards.
trans-unit.target: 如果 playbackRate 为负，则向后播放媒体。

trans-unit.source: If playing is false, indicating that we're currently paused, we change the play button's content to be the Unicode character "pause symbol" (⏸) and call startOscillators() to start the oscillators playing their tones. That code is covered under Starting the oscillators below.
trans-unit.target: 如果 playing 为假（表示我们当前已暂停），则将播放按钮的内容更改为Unicode字符“暂停符号”（⏸），然后调用 startOscillators() 以启动振荡器播放其音调。该代码包含在下面的启动振荡器中。

trans-unit.source: If pname is ext.CURRENT_QUERY_EXT: A WebGLQuery object, which is the currently active query for the given target.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pname 是 ext.CURRENT_QUERY_EXT ：一个 WebGLQuery 对象，它是给定目标的当前活动查询。

trans-unit.source: If pname is ext.QUERY_COUNTER_BITS_EXT: A GLint indicating the number of bits used to hold the query result for the given target.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pname 是 ext.QUERY_COUNTER_BITS_EXT ： GLint 指示用于保存给定目标的查询结果的位数。

trans-unit.source: If pname is ext.QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE_EXT: A GLboolean indicating whether or not a query result is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pname 是 ext.QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE_EXT ： GLboolean ,指示查询结果是否可用。

trans-unit.source: If pname is ext.QUERY_RESULT_EXT: A GLuint64EXT containing the query result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pname 是 ext.QUERY_RESULT_EXT ：包含查询结果的 GLuint64EXT 。

trans-unit.source: If pointerId does not match any the active pointers, this method returns void and throws a DOMException with the name InvalidPointerId.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pointerId 与任何活动指针都不匹配，则此方法返回 void 并引发名称为 InvalidPointerId 的 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: If protocol is "tcp", tcpType represents the type of TCP candidate. Otherwise, tcpType is null.
trans-unit.target: 如果 protocol 为 "tcp" ，则 tcpType 表示TCP候选类型。否则， tcpType 为 null 。

trans-unit.source: If repetition is specified as an empty string ("") or null (but not undefined), a value of "repeat" will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 repetition 指定为空字符串（ "" ）或为 null （但 undefined ），则将使用值 "repeat" 。

trans-unit.source: If requestPresent() is called outside of an engagement gesture the promise will be rejected unless the VRDisplay was already presenting. This engagement gesture is also sufficient to allow requestPointerLock() calls until presentation has ended.
trans-unit.target: 如果在参与手势之外调用 requestPresent() ,则除非 VRDisplay 已经显示，否则承诺将被拒绝。这种参与手势也足以允许 requestPointerLock() 调用直到演示结束。

trans-unit.source: If root is null, then the bounds of the document's viewport (that is, the visible area of the document) are used as the root.
trans-unit.target: 如果 root 为 null ，则将文档视口的边界（即文档的可见区域）用作根。

trans-unit.source: If rootMargin isn't specified when the object was instantiated, it defaults to the string "0px 0px 0px 0px", meaning that the intersection will be computed between the root element's unmodified bounds rectangle and the target's bounds. The root element and root margin in Intersection Observer API describes how the rootMargin is used in more detail.
trans-unit.target: 如果在实例化对象时未指定 rootMargin ，则默认为字符串 "0px 0px 0px 0px" ，这意味着将在根元素的未修改边界矩形和目标边界之间计算交集。根元素和余量根在交叉口观察API描述了如何 rootMargin 更详细地使用。

trans-unit.source: If setLocalDescription() is called while a connection is already in place, it means renegotiation is underway (possibly to adapt to changing network conditions). Because descriptions will be exchanged until the two peers agree on a configuration, the description submitted by calling setLocalDescription() does not immediately take effect. Instead, the current connection configuration remains in place until negotiation is complete. Only then does the agreed-upon configuration take effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果在连接已经建立时调用 setLocalDescription() ，则意味着正在进行重新协商（可能是为了适应不断变化的网络状况）。因为描述将在两个对等方就配置达成一致之前交换，所以通过调用 setLocalDescription() 提交的描述不会立即生效。相反，当前的连接配置将保持不变，直到协商完成。只有这样，商定的配置才会生效。

trans-unit.source: If show() is rejected,
trans-unit.target: 如果 show() 被拒绝，

trans-unit.source: If show() resolves, the returned PaymentResponse describes the completed payment; the process is complete, and no further steps are taken
trans-unit.target: 如果 show() 解析，则返回的 PaymentResponse 描述完成的付款；该过程已完成，无需采取其他措施

trans-unit.source: If sp2 does not have a next sibling, then it must be the last child — sp2.nextSibling returns null, and sp1 is inserted at the end of the child node list (immediately after sp2).
trans-unit.target: 如果 sp2 没有下一个同级，则它必须是最后一个子级— sp2.nextSibling 返回 null ，并且将 sp1 插入到子节点列表的末尾（紧随 sp2 之后）。

trans-unit.source: If streams is not specified, its default value is an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 streams ，则其默认值为一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: If title is subsequently used by browsers, this data can be utilized (independent of, say, the hash).
trans-unit.target: 如果浏览器随后使用 title ，则可以利用此数据（独立于哈希）。

trans-unit.source: If true is specified for a media type, the resulting stream is required to have that type of track in it. If one cannot be included for any reason, the call to getUserMedia() will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果为媒体类型指定了 true ，则要求结果流在其中具有该类型的轨道。如果由于某种原因无法包含其中一个，则对 getUserMedia() 的调用将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: If true, all events are targeted directly to this element; if false, events can also fire at descendants of this element.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则所有事件都直接针对此元素；否则为false。如果为 false ，则事件也可以触发此元素的后代。

trans-unit.source: If true, and the create option is also true, the file must not exist prior to issuing the call. Instead, it must be possible for it to be created newly at call time. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，并且 create 选项也为 true ，则在发出调用之前该文件必须不存在。相反，必须有可能在调用时重新创建它。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the callback specified when observe() was used to start observing the node or subtree is called any time the contents of a text node are changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在更改文本节点的内容时，将调用使用 observe() 开始观察节点或子树时指定的回调。

trans-unit.source: If true, the callback specified when observe() was used to start observing the node or subtree will be called any time one or more attributes have changed on observed nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则当 observe() 到的节点上的一个或多个属性发生更改时，将使用当observe（）用于开始观察节点或子树时指定的回调。

trans-unit.source: If true, the described encoding is currently actively being used. That is, for RTP senders, the encoding is currently being used to send data, while for receivers, the encoding is being used to decode received data.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则当前正在积极使用所描述的编码。也就是说，对于RTP发送器，当前正在使用编码来发送数据，而对于接收器，则正在使用编码来解码接收到的数据。

trans-unit.source: If true, the index will add an entry in the index for each array element when the keyPath resolves to an Array. If false, it will add one single entry containing the Array.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则当keyPath解析为Array 时，索引将在每个数组元素的索引中添加一个条目。如果为 false ，它将添加一个包含数组的单个条目。

trans-unit.source: If true, the method will NOT scroll the element into the visible area of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则该方法将不会将元素滚动到浏览器窗口的可见区域。

trans-unit.source: If true, the object store has a key generator. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则对象存储区具有密钥生成器。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the top of the element will be aligned to the top of the visible area of the scrollable ancestor. Corresponds to scrollIntoViewOptions: {block: "start", inline: "nearest"}. This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则元素的顶部将与可滚动祖先的可见区域的顶部对齐。对应于 scrollIntoViewOptions: {block: "start", inline: "nearest"} 。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: If true, this index does not allow duplicate values for a key.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则此索引不允许键的重复值。

trans-unit.source: If type is null, that information was missing from the candidate's a-line, which will cause RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() to throw an OperationError exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 type 为 null ，则 candidate 的a行中缺少该信息，这将导致 RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() 抛出 OperationError 异常。

trans-unit.source: If mask is not one of the listed possible values, a gl.INVALID_ENUM error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果mask不是列出的可能值之一，则会引发 gl.INVALID_ENUM 错误。

trans-unit.source: If mode is not one of the three possible values, a gl.INVALID_ENUM error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果mode不是三个可能值之一，则抛出 gl.INVALID_ENUM 错误。

trans-unit.source: If sfactor or dfactor is not one of the listed possible values, a gl.INVALID_ENUM error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果sfactor或dfactor不是列出的可能值之一，则会引发 gl.INVALID_ENUM 错误。

trans-unit.source: If srcRGB, dstRGB, srcAlpha, or dstAlpha is not one of the listed possible values, a gl.INVALID_ENUM error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果srcRGB，dstRGB，srcAlpha或dstAlpha不是列出的可能值之一，则抛出 gl.INVALID_ENUM 错误。

trans-unit.source: If texture is not one of gl.TEXTUREI, where I is within the range from 0 to gl.MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS - 1, a gl.INVALID_ENUM error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果纹理不是 gl.TEXTUREI 其中一个，而我在0到 gl.MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS - 1 的范围内，则会引发 gl.INVALID_ENUM 错误。

trans-unit.source: If deep is set to false, then only externalNode is imported — the new node has no children.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 deep 设置为 false ，则仅导入 externalNode －新节点没有子节点。

trans-unit.source: If deep is set to true, then externalNode and all of its descendants are copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 deep 设置为 true ，那么将复制 externalNode 及其所有后代。

trans-unit.source: If index > CSSRuleList.length, then aborts with IndexSizeError.
trans-unit.target: 如果 index > CSSRuleList.length ，则使用 IndexSizeError 中止。

trans-unit.source: If rule cannot be inserted at index0 due to some CSS constraint, then aborts with HierarchyRequestError.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于某些CSS约束而无法在 index 0 处插入 rule ，则将通过 HierarchyRequestError 中止。

trans-unit.source: If rule is @namespace and the rule-list has more than just @import at-rules and/or @namespace at-rules, then aborts with InvalidStateError.
trans-unit.target: 如果 rule 是 @namespace ，并且规则列表不仅仅具有 @import 规则和/或 @namespace 规则，则使用 InvalidStateError 中止。

trans-unit.source: If Animation objects are DVD players, we can think of Animation Effects, or Keyframe Effects, as DVDs. Keyframe Effects are a bundle of information including at the bare minimum a set of keys and the duration they need to be animated over. The Animation Object takes this information and, using the Timeline Object, assembles a playable animation we can view and reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果说Animation对象是DVD播放器,那么我们可以把Animation Effects,或者说Keyframe Effects,看作是DVD。关键帧效果是一束信息,至少包括一组键和它们需要被动画化的持续时间。动画对象获取这些信息,并使用时间轴对象,组装成一个我们可以查看和参考的可播放动画。

trans-unit.source: If DOM Core methods document.createElement and Node.appendChild are used to create rows and cells, IE requires that they are appended to a tbody element, whereas other browsers will allow appending to a table element (the rows will be added to the last tbody element).
trans-unit.target: 如果使用DOM Core方法 document.createElement 和 Node.appendChild 创建行和单元格，则IE要求将它们附加到tbody元素上，而其他浏览器将允许将它们附加到table元素上（行将添加到最后一个tbody中）元件）。

trans-unit.source: If a worker script is intercepted, then the final URL is used to set self.location and used as the base URL for relative URLs in the worker script.
trans-unit.target: 如果拦截了工作程序脚本，则最终URL将用于设置 self.location 并用作工作程序脚本中相对URL的基本URL。

trans-unit.source: If a fetch() is intercepted, then you can observe the final URL on the result's Response.url.
trans-unit.target: 如果 fetch() 被拦截，则可以在结果的 Response.url 上观察最终URL 。

trans-unit.source: If a timeslice property was passed into the MediaRecorder.start() method that started media capture, a dataavailable event is fired every timeslice milliseconds. That means that each blob will have a specific time duration (except the last blob, which might be shorter, since it would be whatever is left over since the last event). So if the method call looked like this — recorder.start(1000); — the dataavailable event would fire after each second of media capture, and our event handler would be called every second with a blob of media data that's one second long. You can use timeslice alongside MediaRecorder.stop() and MediaRecorder.requestData() to produce multiple same-length blobs plus other shorter blobs as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个 timeslice 属性被传递到 MediaRecorder.start() 即启动媒体捕获方法中， dataavailable 事件被解雇每次 timeslice 毫秒。这意味着每个Blob都有特定的持续时间（最后一个Blob除外，后者可能更短，因为它将是自上次事件以来剩下的所有东西）。因此，如果该方法调用看起来像这样 recorder.start(1000); -在 dataavailable 事件将媒体捕获的每一秒发生火灾后，我们的事件处理程序将被称为与媒体数据的BLOB每秒即坚持一个第二长。您可以使用 timeslice 一起 MediaRecorder.stop() 和 MediaRecorder.requestData() 产生多个相同长度的Blob，以及其他较短的Blob。

trans-unit.source: If a Boolean value is specified, it simply indicates whether or not a video track should be included in the returned stream; if it's true, a video track is included; if no video source is available or if permission is not given to use the video source, the call to getUserMedia() will fail. If false, no video track is included.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了布尔值，则它仅指示在返回的流中是否应包含视频轨道；如果为 true ，则包含视频轨道；如果没有可用的视频源，或者未获得使用该视频源的权限，则对 getUserMedia() 的调用将失败。如果为 false ，则不包含视频轨道。

trans-unit.source: If a Boolean value is specified, it simply indicates whether or not an audio track should be included in the returned stream; if it's true, an audio track is included; if no audio source is available or if permission is not given to use the audio source, the call to getUserMedia() will fail. If false, no audio track is included.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了布尔值，则它仅指示在返回的流中是否应包含音轨；如果为 true ，则包含音轨；如果没有可用的音频源，或者未获得使用音频源的权限，则对 getUserMedia() 的调用将失败。如果为 false ，则不包含音轨。

trans-unit.source: If a File is created dynamically, the last modified time can be supplied in the new File() constructor function. If it is missing, lastModified inherits the current time from Date.now() at the moment the File object gets created.
trans-unit.target: 如果动态创建文件，则可以在 new File() 构造函数中提供最后修改的时间。如果缺少该属性，则在创建File对象时，lastModified将从 Date.now() 继承当前时间。

trans-unit.source: If a XUL document attempts to load an overlay without the compile flag, an error will be thrown (see bug 1448162).
trans-unit.target: 如果XUL文档尝试在没有编译标志的情况下加载覆盖，则会引发错误（请参见bug 1448162）。

trans-unit.source: If a box is marked as "persistent", the contents won't be cleared by the user agent without either the data's origin itself or the user specifically doing so. This includes scenarios such as the user selecting a "Clear Caches" or "Clear Recent History" option. The user will be asked specifically for permission to remove persistent site storage units.
trans-unit.target: 如果将框标记为 "persistent" ，则没有数据源本身或用户未明确执行操作，用户代理将不会清除内容。这包括诸如用户选择“清除缓存”或“清除最近历史记录”选项之类的方案。将特别要求用户授予删除永久站点存储单元的权限。

trans-unit.source: If a call to requestPresent() is rejected while the VRDisplay is already presenting it will end its presentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 VRDisplay 已经呈现时对 requestPresent() 的调用被拒绝，它将结束其呈现。

trans-unit.source: If a candidate represents both RTP and RTCP multiplexed together, it is reported as an RTP candidate.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个候选者同时代表RTP和RTCP复用,则报告为RTP候选者。

trans-unit.source: If a chunk is available to read, the promise will be fulfilled with an object of the form { value: theChunk, done: false }.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个chunk可供读取,承诺将用一个形式为{value:theChunk,done:false }的对象来实现。

trans-unit.source: If a chunk is available, the promise will be fulfilled with an object of the form { value: theChunk, done: false }.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可用的块，则将通过 { value: theChunk, done: false } 形式的对象来实现承诺。

trans-unit.source: If a constant color and a constant alpha value are used together as source (srcRGB) and destination (dstRGB) factors, a gl.INVALID_ENUM error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果将恒定的颜色和恒定的alpha值一起用作源（ srcRGB ）和目标（ dstRGB ）因素，则会引发 gl.INVALID_ENUM 错误。

trans-unit.source: If a constant color and a constant alpha value are used together as source and destination factors, a gl.INVALID_ENUM error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果将恒定的颜色和恒定的alpha值一起用作源因子和目标因子，则会引发 gl.INVALID_ENUM 错误。

trans-unit.source: If a document exists in the target, this method clears it (see the example above).
trans-unit.target: 如果目标中存在一个文档,本方法就会清除它(见上面的例子)。

trans-unit.source: If a feature policy blocks use of a feature it is because your code is inconsistent with the policies set on your server. This is not something that would ever be shown to a user. See Feature-Policy for implementation insfructions.
trans-unit.target: 如果功能策略禁止使用功能，那是因为您的代码与服务器上设置的策略不一致。这绝不会显示给用户。有关实现说明，请参见 Feature-Policy 。

trans-unit.source: If a feature policy blocks use of a feature it is because your code is inconsistent with the policies set on your server. This is not something that would ever be shown to a user. See Feature-Policy for implementation instructions.
trans-unit.target: 如果功能策略禁止使用功能，那是因为您的代码与服务器上设置的策略不一致。这绝不会显示给用户。有关实现说明，请参见 Feature-Policy 。

trans-unit.source: If a form control (such as a reset button) has a name or id of reset it will mask the form's reset method. It does not reset other attributes in the input, such as disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果表单控件（例如，复位按钮）具有名称或ID reset 它将掩盖形式的复位方法。它不会重置输入中的其他属性，例如 disabled 。

trans-unit.source: If a form control (such as a submit button) has a name or id of submit it will mask the form's submit method.
trans-unit.target: 如果表单控件（如提交按钮）具有一个名称或ID submit 它会掩盖表单提交方法。

trans-unit.source: If a given element is focused, this method draws a focus ring around the current path.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的元素被聚焦,本方法会在当前路径周围画一个聚焦环。

trans-unit.source: If a key is found it is set as the result of the request object: this returns the primary key of the record the key is associated with, not the whole record as IDBIndex.get does.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了键，则将其设置为请求对象的 result ：这将返回该键与之关联的记录的主键，而不是 IDBIndex.get 所做的整个记录。

trans-unit.source: If a key is successfully found, then a structured clone of it is created and set as the result of the request object.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功找到一个密钥,那么就会创建一个结构化的克隆,并将其设置为请求对象的结果。

trans-unit.source: If a label parameter is include but there is not corresponding timer:
trans-unit.target: 如果包含一个标签参数,但没有相应的定时器。

trans-unit.source: If a label parameter was supplied:
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了一个标签参数。

trans-unit.source: If a listener is registered twice, one with capture and one without, remove each one separately. Removal of a capturing listener does not affect a non-capturing version of the same listener, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个监听器注册了两次,一次是带捕获功能的,另一次是不带捕获功能的,则分别删除每个监听器。移除捕获的监听器不会影响同一监听器的非捕获版本,反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: If a local description change is in progress, this is an RTCSessionDescription describing the proposed configuration. Otherwise, this returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在进行本地描述更改，则这是描述建议配置的 RTCSessionDescription 。否则，返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: If a match wasn’t found in the cache, and the network isn’t available, you could just match the request with some kind of default fallback page as a response using match(), like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果在缓存中找不到匹配项，并且网络不可用，则可以使用 match() 将请求与某种默认后备页面进行匹配，作为响应，例如：

trans-unit.source: If a node does not have a title attribute, then the default action is to inherit it from its parent node, which in turn may inherit it from its parent node, etc.

trans-unit.source: If a page from top-level origin foo.example embeds more than one <iframe> from tracker.example, and one of those <iframe>s uses the Storage Access API in order to obtain storage access successfully, all other iframes from tracker.example on foo.example top-level origins will immediately gain storage access as well, without needing to call requestStorageAccess() separately.

trans-unit.source: If a user has exited pointer lock via the default unlock gesture, or pointer lock has not previously been entered for this document, an event generated as a result of an engagement gesture must be received by the document before requestPointerLock will succeed. (from https://w3c.github.io/pointerlock/#extensions-to-the-element-interface)
trans-unit.target: 如果用户已通过默认的解锁手势退出了指针锁定，或者以前未为此文档输入过指针锁定，则文档必须接收到由于参与手势而产生的事件，然后 requestPointerLock 才会成功。（来自https://w3c.github.io/pointerlock/#extensions-to-the-element-interface）

trans-unit.source: If a value is specified for replaceBox, we use that as the ad element. To do so, we begin by ending observation of the element by calling IntersectionObserver.unobserve(). Then the local variables for each of the elements that comprise an ad: the ad box itself, the title, the body, and the timer box, are all set to the corresponding elements in the existing ad.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 replaceBox 指定了一个值，我们将其用作广告元素。为此，我们通过调用 IntersectionObserver.unobserve() 结束对元素的观察。然后，构成广告的每个元素的局部变量：广告框本身，标题，正文和计时器框，都将设置为现有广告中的相应元素。

trans-unit.source: If a value is successfully found, then a structured clone of it is created and set as the result of the request object.

trans-unit.source: If a window does not have a parent, its parent property is a reference to itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗口没有父窗口，则 parent 属性是对自身的引用。

trans-unit.source: If a window with the name already exists, then strUrl is loaded into the existing window. In this case the return value of the method is the existing window and strWindowFeatures is ignored. Providing an empty string for strUrl is a way to get a reference to an open window by its name without changing the window's location. To open a new window on every call of window.open(), use the special value _blank for strWindowName.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有该名称的窗口已经存在，则将 strUrl 加载到现有窗口中。在这种情况下，该方法的返回值是现有窗口，而 strWindowFeatures 被忽略。为 strUrl 提供空字符串是一种通过其名称获取对打开的窗口的引用而无需更改窗口位置的方法。要在每次调用 window.open() 时打开一个新窗口，请对 strWindowName 使用特殊值 _blank 。

trans-unit.source: If an EventListener is added to an EventTarget while it is processing an event, that event does not trigger the listener. However, that same listener may be triggered during a later stage of event flow, such as the bubbling phase.
trans-unit.target: 如果在处理事件时将 EventListener 添加到 EventTarget ，则该事件不会触发侦听器。但是，可以在事件流的后期（例如冒泡阶段）触发同一侦听器。

trans-unit.source: If an EventListener is removed from an EventTarget while it is processing an event, it will not be triggered by the current actions. An EventListener will not be invoked for the event it was registered for after being removed. However, it can be reattached.
trans-unit.target: 如果在处理事件时将 EventListener 从 EventTarget 中删除，则它将不会被当前操作触发。一个 EventListener 不会被调用为它注册了被去除之后，该事件。但是，它可以重新连接。

trans-unit.source: If an ICE restart occurs, the candidate gathering and connectivity check process is started over again; this will cause a transition from the "connected" state if the restart occurred while the state was "completed". If the restart occured during a transient "disconnected" state, the state transitions to "checking"
trans-unit.target: 如果ICE重新启动，则重新开始候选者收集和连接检查过程；否则，将重新开始。如果在状态 "completed" 发生重新启动，这将导致从 "connected" 状态过渡。如果重新启动是在瞬态 "disconnected" 状态下发生的，则状态将转换为 "checking"

trans-unit.source: If an embedded page from tracker.example has previously successfully obtained storage access on top-level origin foo.example, all embedded subresources from tracker.example on foo.example (e.g. scripts, images, stylesheets, etc.) will load with access to their first-party storage, which means they may send Cookie headers and honor incoming Set-Cookie headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果来自 tracker.example 的嵌入式页面先前已成功获取了对顶级来源 foo.example 的存储访问权限，则来自 tracker.example 的 foo.example 上的所有嵌入式子资源（例如脚本，图像，样式表等）都将加载对他们的第一方存储空间，这意味着他们可以发送Cookie标头并兑现传入的 Set-Cookie 标头。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurred during validation of the address due to one of the strings in the addressLine array having an invalid value, this property is set to a DOMString providing a human-readable error message explaining the validation error.
trans-unit.target: 如果在地址验证期间由于 addressLine 数组中的字符串之一具有无效值而发生错误，则将此属性设置为 DOMString ,以提供易于理解的错误消息来说明验证错误。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurred during validation of the address due to the country property having an invalid value, this property is set to a DOMString providing a human-readable error message explaining the validation error.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于 country 属性具有无效值而在地址验证期间发生错误，则将此属性设置为 DOMString ,以提供易于理解的错误消息来说明验证错误。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurrs while linking the program, the error message is logged to console.
trans-unit.target: 如果在链接程序时发生错误,错误信息会被记录到控制台。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs applying either set of constraints, handleError() is used to output a message into the log.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用任何一组约束都发生错误，则使用 handleError() 将消息输出到日志中。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs while attempting to connect, first a simple event with the name "error" is sent to the WebSocket object (thereby invoking its onerror handler), and then the CloseEvent is sent to the WebSocket object (thereby invoking its onclose handler) to indicate the reason for the connection's closing.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试连接时发生错误，则首先将一个名称为“ error”的简单事件发送到 WebSocket 对象（从而调用其 onerror 处理程序），然后将 CloseEvent 发送到 WebSocket 对象（从而调用其 onclose 处理程序）指示连接关闭的原因。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs while the database connection is being opened, then an error event is fired on the request object returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果在打开数据库连接时发生错误，则将从此方法返回的请求对象上触发错误事件。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs while the database is being opened.

trans-unit.target: 如果在初始 createOffer() 或随后的任何实现处理程序中发生错误，则通过调用 reportError() 函数来报告错误。

trans-unit.source: If any fields have unacceptable values, or if an exception is thrown by the previous code, complete() is called with the string "fail", which indicates that the payment process is complete and failed.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何字段的值都不可接受，或者先前的代码引发了异常，则使用字符串 "fail" 调用 complete() ，这表明支付过程已完成且失败。

trans-unit.source: If any header is not understood or has an incorrect value , the server should send a "400 Bad Request" and immediately close the socket. As usual, it may also give the reason why the handshake failed in the HTTP response body, but the message may never be displayed (browsers do not display it). If the server doesn't understand that version of WebSockets, it should send a Sec-WebSocket-Version header back that contains the version(s) it does understand. (This guide explains v13, the newest). Now, let's move on to the most curious header, Sec-WebSocket-Key.
trans-unit.target: 如果不理解任何标头或标头的值不正确，则服务器应发送“ 400 Bad Request ”并立即关闭套接字。与往常一样，它也可以说明HTTP响应正文中握手失败的原因，但是该消息可能永远不会显示（浏览器不会显示该消息）。如果服务器不了解该版本的WebSocket，则应向后发送一个 Sec-WebSocket-Version 标头，其中包含其确实了解的版本。（本指南介绍了最新的v13）。现在，让我们转到最奇怪的标题 Sec-WebSocket-Key 。

trans-unit.source: If any of the arguments are Infinity the transformation matrix must be marked as infinite instead of the method throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数为 Infinity ,则转换矩阵必须标记为Infinite，而不是方法引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If any other type is encountered, a TypeError exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到任何其他类型，将 TypeError 异常。

trans-unit.source: If anything goes wrong during recording, an error event is sent to the MediaRecorder. You can listen for error events by setting up a onerror event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果在录制过程中发生任何错误，则会将 error 事件发送到 MediaRecorder 。您可以通过设置 onerror 事件处理程序来侦听 error 事件。

trans-unit.source: If at any time an error occurs, the catch() clause outputs an error message to the log.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何时候发生错误， catch() 子句都会向日志输出错误消息。

trans-unit.source: If at least one key matches the key range, then a success event is fired on the result object, with its result set to the new IDBCursor object; the value of the cursor object is set to the value of the found record.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少一个键与键范围匹配，那么将在结果对象上触发成功事件，并将其 result 设置为新的 IDBCursor 对象；的 value 光标对象的被设置为所找到的记录的值。

trans-unit.target: 如果至少一条记录与键范围匹配，则将事件的 result 属性设置为新的 IDBCursor 对象；否则，将结果设置为新IDBCursor对象。的 value 光标对象的被设置为参考值的结构化的克隆。

trans-unit.source: If attaching a handler function to an element using addEventListener(), the value of this inside the handler is a reference to the element. It is the same as the value of the currentTarget property of the event argument that is passed to the handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 addEventListener() 将处理程序函数附加到元素，则该函数在处理程序内部的值是 this 元素的引用。它与传递给处理程序的事件参数的 currentTarget 属性的值相同。

trans-unit.source: If bits per second values are not specified for video and/or audio, the default adopted for video is 2.5Mbps, while the audio default is adaptive, depending upon the sample rate and the number of channels.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定视频和/或音频的每秒比特值,则视频的默认值为2.5Mbps,而音频的默认值是自适应的,取决于采样率和通道数。

trans-unit.source: If conditions change—for example the network connection deteriorates—one or both peers might suggest switching to a lower-bandwidth media resolution, or to an alternative codec. This triggers a new exchange of candidates, after which a another media format and/or codec change may take place.
trans-unit.target: 如果条件发生变化（例如，网络连接恶化），则一个或两个对等方可能会建议切换到较低带宽的媒体分辨率或其他编解码器。这触发了新的候选者交换，此后可能发生另一种媒体格式和/或编解码器更改。

trans-unit.source: If developers do not take utmost care, VR apps can actually cause their users to feel sick. This effect is produced when the stimuli their eyes are receiving is not what the body expects to receive.
trans-unit.target: 如果开发者不极力注意,VR应用实际上可能会导致用户感到不适。当他们的眼睛所接受的刺激与身体所期望接受的不一样时,就会产生这种效果。

trans-unit.source: If during the process of unloading the previous document which was loaded in the window, a confirmation dialog was displayed to let the user confirm whether or not to leave the previous page, the time origin is the time at which the user confirmed that navigating to the new page was acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 如果在卸载窗口中加载的前一个文档的过程中,显示了一个确认对话框,让用户确认是否离开前一个页面,时间原点就是用户确认导航到新页面的时间。

trans-unit.source: If either width or height is a negative value, a gl.INVALID_VALUE error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果width或height为负值，则会引发 gl.INVALID_VALUE 错误。

trans-unit.source: If enumeration fails, the promise is rejected.
trans-unit.target: 如果列举失败,则拒绝承诺。

trans-unit.source: If fallback content is not needed, a simple <canvas id="foo" ...></canvas> is fully compatible with all browsers that support canvas at all.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要回退内容，则简单的 <canvas id="foo" ...></canvas> 完全兼容所有支持canvas的浏览器。

trans-unit.target: 如果全屏模式已经处于活动状态（ fullscreenElement 不为 null ），则在 document 上调用 exitFullscreen() 以关闭全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: If it is set without first setting the username property, it silently fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果在未先设置 username 属性的情况下进行了设置，则它会自动失败。

trans-unit.source: If it's determined that there are no certificates in place, RTCPeerConnection.generateCertificate() is called to create a new certificate; we provide a fulfillment handler which adds a new array containing the one newly-created certificate to the current configuration and passes it to setConfiguration() to add the certificate to the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定没有证书，则调用 RTCPeerConnection.generateCertificate() 来创建新证书；否则，将创建新证书。我们提供了一个实现处理程序，该处理程序将一个包含一个新创建的证书的新数组添加到当前配置，并将其传递给 setConfiguration() 以将该证书添加到连接中。

trans-unit.source: If javascript support is disabled or non-existent, then the user agent will create a secondary window accordingly or will render the referenced resource according to its handling of the target attribute: e.g. some user agents which can not create new windows, like MS Web TV, will fetch the referenced resource and append it at the end of the current document. The goal and the idea is to try to provide - not impose - to the user a way to open the referenced resource, a mode of opening the link. Your code should not interfere with the features of the browser at the disposal of the user and your code should not interfere with the final decision resting with the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用或不支持javascript，则用户代理将相应地创建辅助窗口或根据其对目标属性的处理来呈现引用的资源：例如某些无法创建新窗口的用户代理，例如MS Web TV ，将获取引用的资源并将其附加在当前文档的末尾。目的和想法是尝试向用户提供（而不是强加）一种打开引用资源的方式，一种打开链接的方式。您的代码不应干扰用户可以使用的浏览器功能，并且代码也不应干扰用户的最终决定。

trans-unit.source: If later on the consumer again wants to receive data, we can use the pull method in the stream creation to tell our underlying source to feed our stream with data.
trans-unit.target: 如果以后消费者又想接收数据,我们可以在流的创建中使用pull方法,告诉我们的底层源头给我们的流提供数据。

trans-unit.source: If left is set but top has no value and screenY has a value, then left and screenY will be the coordinate positioning values of the secondary window.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了left,但top没有值,screenY有值,那么left和screenY将是辅助窗口的坐标定位值。

trans-unit.source: If more than one rule is given in the rule parameter, then aborts with SyntaxError.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 rule 参数中给出了多个规则，则使用 SyntaxError 中止。

trans-unit.source: If multiple identical EventListeners are registered on the same EventTarget with the same parameters, the duplicate instances are discarded. They do not cause the EventListener to be called twice, and they do not need to be removed manually with the removeEventListener() method. Note however that when using an anonymous function as the handler, such listeners will NOT be identical since anonymous functions are not identical even if defined using the SAME unchanging source-code simply called repeatedly, even if in a loop. However, repeatedly defining the same named function in such cases can be more problematic. (see Memory issues below.)
trans-unit.target: 如果在相同的 EventTarget 上使用相同的参数注册了多个相同的 EventListener ，则将丢弃重复的实例。它们不会导致两次调用 EventListener ，也不需要使用 removeEventListener() 方法手动将其删除。但是请注意，当使用匿名函数作为处理程序时，这样的侦听器将不会完全相同，因为即使使用SAME不变的源代码（即使在循环中也是如此）重复定义，匿名函数也不相同。但是，在这种情况下重复定义相同的命名函数可能会带来更多问题。 （请参阅下面的内存问题。）

trans-unit.source: If necessary, intermediate values of the distortion curve are linearly interpolated.
trans-unit.target: 必要时,对失真曲线的中间值进行线性插值。

trans-unit.source: If needed, call MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints() to get the list of supported constraints, which tells you what constrainable properties the browser knows about. This isn't always necessary, since any that aren't known will simply be ignored when you specify them—but if you have any that you can't get by without, you can start by checking to be sure they're on the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，请调用 MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints() 以获取受支持约束的列表，该列表将告诉您浏览器知道哪些可约束属性。这并非总是必要的，因为在您指定它们时，所有未知的东西都将被忽略，但是如果您有其他东西，您可以先检查一下它们是否在清单。

trans-unit.source: If needed, you can determine whether or not this constraint is supported by checking the value of MediaTrackSupportedConstraints.aspectRatio as returned by a call to MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints(). trans-unit.source: If neither attribute is present, then the script is fetched and executed immediately, blocking further parsing of the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个属性都不存在,那么脚本就会被获取并立即执行,阻止对页面的进一步解析。

trans-unit.source: If neither of the above determines the time origin, then the time origin is the time at which the navigation responsible for creating the window's current Document took place.
trans-unit.target: 如果以上方法均不能确定时间原点，则时间原点是负责创建窗口当前 Document 的导航发生的时间。

trans-unit.source: If no Accept header has been set using the setRequestHeader(), an Accept header with the type "*/*" (any type) is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 Accept 使用标头已被设置 setRequestHeader() 中， Accept 与该类型报头 "*/*" （任何类型的）被发送。

trans-unit.source: If no Accept header has been set using this, an Accept header with the type "*/*" is sent with the request when send() is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用此方法设置任何 Accept 头，则在调用 send() 时，将与请求一起发送类型为 "*/*" 的 Accept 头。

trans-unit.source: If no threshold option was included when IntersectionObserver() was used to instantiate the observer, the value of thresholds is simply [0].
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 threshold 时被列入选项 IntersectionObserver() 被用于实例化观察者的值 thresholds 是简单地 [0] 。

trans-unit.source: If no camera exists with this resolution or higher, then the returned promise will be rejected with OverconstrainedError, and the user will not be prompted.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在具有此分辨率或更高分辨率的相机，则返回的诺言将被 OverconstrainedError 拒绝，并且不会提示用户。

trans-unit.source: If no existing sender exists that can be reused, a new one is created. This also results in the creation of the associated objects that must exist. The process of creating a new sender results in these changes:
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在可重复使用的现有发送者,则创建一个新的发送者。这也会导致创建必须存在的相关对象。创建新发件人的过程会导致这些变化。

trans-unit.source: If no keys ranges match the key range specified, then then an error event is fired on the request object.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有键值范围与指定的键值范围相匹配,那么就会对请求对象发出错误事件。

trans-unit.source: If no label parameter included:
trans-unit.target: 如果不包含标签参数。

trans-unit.source: If no label was supplied:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供标签。

trans-unit.source: If no matches are found, the returned value is null.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到匹配项，则返回值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: If no options are currently selected, the collection is empty and returns a length of 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前未选择任何选项，则该集合为空并返回0 length 。

trans-unit.source: If no record exists in this index for the given key.
trans-unit.target: 如果该索引中没有给定键的记录。

trans-unit.source: If no records exist in this index for the requested key range.
trans-unit.target: 如果该索引中不存在所请求的键范围的记录。

trans-unit.source: If no records match the key range then then the result property of the event is set to null.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有记录与键范围匹配，则将事件的 result 属性设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified for replaceBox, we create a new ad element. The ad's new <div> element is created and its properties established by setting its class name to "ad". Next, the ad title element is created, along with the body and the visibility timer; these are an <h2>, a <p>, and a <div> element, respectively. These elements are appended to the adBox element.
trans-unit.target: 如果未为replaceBox指定值，我们将创建一个新的ad元素。通过将广告的类名称设置为 "ad" 可以创建广告的新 <div> 元素并建立其属性。接下来，创建广告标题元素，以及正文和可见性计时器；它们分别是 <h2> ， <p> 和 <div> 元素。这些元素将附加到 adBox 元素。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified for the body, a default value of null is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为主体指定任何值，则使用默认值 null 。

trans-unit.source: If noOverwrite was true, and a record exists in this index for the given key or this index is auto-populated; or if no record exists with the given key in the index's referenced object store.
trans-unit.target: 如果noOverwrite为真,且该索引中存在给定键的记录,或者该索引是自动填充的;或者该索引的引用对象存储中不存在给定键的记录。

trans-unit.source: If normalized, the resulting wave will have a maximum absolute peak value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果归一化,所产生的波的最大绝对峰值为1。

trans-unit.source: If not null, sdpMLineIndex indicates the zero-based index number of the media description (as defined in RFC 4566) in the SDP with which the candidate is associated.
trans-unit.target: 如果不为 null ，则 sdpMLineIndex 指示与候选者相关联的SDP中媒体描述（如RFC 4566中定义）的从零开始的索引号。

trans-unit.source: If not set, the default value 1 will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不设置,将使用默认值1。

trans-unit.source: If not specified in the constructor, this value will be an empty string and the SourceBuffer can contain any tracks of the specified TrackDefault.type.
trans-unit.target: 如果未在构造函数中指定，则此值将为空字符串，并且 SourceBuffer 可以包含指定 TrackDefault.type 的任何轨道。

trans-unit.source: If not specified when the request is created, it takes the default value of follow.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建请求时未指定，则采用默认值 follow 。

trans-unit.source: If not, fetch the request from the network, then also open the cache created in the first block and add a clone of the request to it using Cache.put (cache.put(event.request, response.clone()).)
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，请从网络获取请求，然后还打开在第一个块中创建的缓存，并使用 Cache.put （cache.put cache.put(event.request, response.clone()) 向其添加请求的副本。

trans-unit.source: If not, open the v1 cache using CacheStorage.open(), put the default network request in the cache using Cache.put() and return a clone of the default network request using return response.clone(). The last is necessary because put() consumes the response body.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，请使用 CacheStorage.open() 打开 v1 缓存，使用 Cache.put() 将默认网络请求放入缓存中，然后使用 return response.clone() 返回默认网络请求的克隆。最后一个是必要的，因为 put() 占用了响应主体。

trans-unit.source: If not, open the v1 cache using open(), put the default network request in the cache using Cache.put() and return a clone of the default network request using return response.clone(). The last is necessary because put() consumes the response body.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，请使用 open() 打开 v1 缓存，使用 Cache.put() 将默认网络请求放入缓存中，然后使用 return response.clone() 返回默认网络请求的克隆。最后一个是必要的，因为 put() 占用了响应主体。

trans-unit.source: If not, open the v1 cache using open(), put the default network request in the cache using Cache.put() and return a clone of the default network request using return response.clone(). Clone is needed because put() consumes the response body.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，请使用 open() 打开 v1 缓存，使用 Cache.put() 将默认网络请求放入缓存中，然后使用 return response.clone() 返回默认网络请求的克隆。需要克隆，因为 put() 占用了响应主体。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, count() outputs the number of times it has been called at that line.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则 count() 输出在该行被调用的次数。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, count() resets the default counter to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略， count() 会将默认计数器重置为0。

trans-unit.source: If on, the new created window floats below, under its own parent when the parent window is not minimized. alwaysLowered windows are often referred as pop-under windows. The alwaysLowered window can not be on top of the parent but the parent window can be minimized. In NS 6.x, the alwaysLowered window has no minimize system command icon and no restore/maximize system command.
trans-unit.target: 如果开启,当父窗口没有最小化时,新创建的窗口会漂浮在其父窗口的下方,在其父窗口的下方。alwaysLowered窗口不能在父窗口的上方,但父窗口可以被最小化。在NS 6.x中,alwaysLowered窗口没有最小化系统命令图标,也没有还原/最大化系统命令。

trans-unit.source: If on, the new window is said to be dependent of its parent window. A dependent window closes when its parent window closes. A dependent window is minimized on the Windows task bar only when its parent window is minimized. On Windows platforms, a dependent window does not show on the task bar. A dependent window also stays in front of the parent window.
trans-unit.target: 如果开启,则表示新窗口是其父窗口的附属窗口。从属窗口在其父窗口关闭时关闭。从属窗口只有在其父窗口最小化时才会在Windows任务栏上最小化。在Windows平台上,从属窗口不会显示在任务栏上。从属窗口也会停留在父窗口的前面。

trans-unit.source: If on, the new window is said to be modal. The user cannot return to the main window until the modal window is closed. A typical modal window is created by the alert() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，则将新窗口称为模态窗口。除非关闭模式窗口，否则用户无法返回主窗口。一个典型的模式窗口是由alert（）函数创建的。

trans-unit.source: If on, the new window will always be displayed on top of other browser windows, regardless of whether it is active or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果开启,新窗口将始终显示在其他浏览器窗口的顶部,无论它是否处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: If on, the page is loaded as window's only content, without any of the browser's interface elements. There will be no context menu defined by default and none of the standard keyboard shortcuts will work. The page is supposed to provide a user interface of its own, usually this feature is used to open XUL documents (standard dialogs like the JavaScript Console are opened this way).
trans-unit.target: 如果开启,则页面作为窗口的唯一内容加载,不含任何浏览器的界面元素。默认情况下不会定义上下文菜单,标准的键盘快捷键也无法使用。页面应该提供一个自己的用户界面,通常这个功能是用来打开XUL文档的(像JavaScript控制台这样的标准对话框就是这样打开的)。

trans-unit.source: If possible, you may also include the file URL of the file using both the text/uri-list and/or text/plain types. These types should be added last so that the more specific application/x-moz-file type has higher priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，您还可以同时使用 text/uri-list 和/或 text/plain 类型包括文件的文件URL 。这些类型应最后添加，以便更特定的 application/x-moz-file 类型具有更高的优先级。

trans-unit.source: If present, this DOMString is a string describing the validation error from which the payer's email address—as given by PaymentResponse.payerEmail—currently suffers. If this property is absent from the PayerErrors object, the email address passed validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则此 DOMString 是描述验证错误的字符串，付款人的电子邮件地址（如 PaymentResponse.payerEmail 所给）目前遭受验证错误。如果 PayerErrors 对象缺少此属性，则该电子邮件地址已通过验证。

trans-unit.source: If present, this string is an error message explaining why the payer's phone number (PaymentResponse.payerPhone) failed validation. This property is absent if the phone number passed validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则此字符串是一条错误消息，解释了付款人的电话号码（ PaymentResponse.payerPhone ）验证失败的原因。如果电话号码通过了验证，则此属性不存在。

trans-unit.source: If provided, this must be a method which is caled when an error occurs while trying to create the FileWriter. This callback receives as input a FileError object describing the error.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则此方法必须是在尝试创建 FileWriter 时发生错误时校准的方法。此回调接收描述错误的 FileError 对象作为输入。

trans-unit.source: If provided, this must be a method which is called when an error occurs while trying to create the File. This callback receives as input a FileError object describing the error.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则此方法必须是在尝试创建 File 时发生错误时调用的方法。此回调接收描述错误的 FileError 对象作为输入。

trans-unit.source: If requested via payment options, returns the shipping address chosen by the user for the purposes of calculating shipping. This property is only populated if the constructor is called with the requestShipping flag set to true. Additionally, in some browsers, the parts of the address will be redacted for privacy until the user indicates they are ready to complete the transaction (i.e., they hit "Pay").
trans-unit.target: 如果通过付款方式提出要求，则返回用户选择的送货地址，以计算运费。仅当将 requestShipping 标志设置为true 调用构造函数时，才会填充此属性。另外，在某些浏览器中，地址的各个部分将被删除以保护隐私，直到用户表明他们准备好完成交易（即，他们点击“付款”）为止。

trans-unit.source: If reserving all the database objects identified in storeNames takes longer than the timeout interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果保留 storeNames 中标识的所有数据库对象，则花费的时间将超过 timeout 间隔。

trans-unit.source: If resetting the playback position to the beginning of the media actually changes the playback position (that is, it was not already at the beginning), a timeupdate event is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果将播放位置重置为媒体的开头实际更改了播放位置（即尚未在开头），则会发送 timeupdate 事件。

trans-unit.source: If set by the controller, the value of the defaultRequest attribute SHOULD be used by the controlling user agent as the
trans-unit.target: 如果由设定控制器，所述的值 defaultRequest 属性应该被用来控制用户代理作为

trans-unit.source: If set to a value greater than the maximum available for the element, scrollTop settles itself to the maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置的值大于元素的最大可用值,则scrollTop会自行沉淀到最大值。

trans-unit.source: If set to a value greater than the maximum that the content can be scrolled, scrollLeft is set to the maximum.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置的值大于可以滚动内容的最大值，则 scrollLeft 设置为最大值。

trans-unit.source: If set to a value less than 0 (greater than 0 for right-to-left elements), scrollLeft is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为小于0的值（从右到左元素大于0），则 scrollLeft 设置为0。

trans-unit.source: If several listeners are attached to the same element for the same event type, they are called in order in which they have been added. If during one such call, event.stopImmediatePropagation() is called, no remaining listeners will be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果针对同一事件类型将多个侦听器附加到同一元素，则会按添加它们的顺序调用它们。如果在一个这样的调用中，调用 event.stopImmediatePropagation() ，则不会调用其余的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: If something is wrong with the payment response's data (and there is a recoverable error), this method allows a merchant to request that the user retry the payment. The method takes an object as argument, which is used to signal to the user exactly what is wrong with the payment response so they can try to correct any issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果支付响应的数据有问题(并且有一个可恢复的错误),这个方法允许商家要求用户重试支付。该方法需要一个对象作为参数,用来向用户发出信号,说明支付响应到底出了什么问题,以便他们可以尝试纠正任何问题。

trans-unit.source: If successful, a service worker registration ties the provided script URL to a scope, which is subsequently used for navigation matching. You can call this method unconditionally from the controlled page. I.e., you don't need to first check whether there's an active registration.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，则服务工作者注册会将提供的脚本URL绑定到作用域，该作用域随后用于导航匹配。您可以从受控页面无条件调用此方法。即，您不需要首先检查是否有有效的注册。

trans-unit.source: If successful, the service worker is executed in a ServiceWorkerGlobalScope; this is basically a special kind of worker context, running off the main script execution thread, with no DOM access.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，则在 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 中执行服务工作者。这基本上是一种特殊的工作程序上下文，它运行在主脚本执行线程上，没有DOM访问权限。

trans-unit.source: If such a PresentationConnection exists, let E be that PresentationConnection, and run the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 如果存在这样的 PresentationConnection ，则使 E 为 PresentationConnection ，然后运行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: If such a PresentationConnection exists, run the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 如果存在这样的 PresentationConnection ，请运行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: If supplied, count() outputs the number of times it has been called with that label.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供， count() 输出使用该标签调用它的次数。

trans-unit.source: If supplied, countReset() resets the count for that label to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供， countReset() 会将该标签的计数重置为0。

trans-unit.source: If supported, textures can be stored in a compressed format in video memory. This allows for additional detail while limiting the added video memory necessary. Textures are uncompressed on the fly when being accessed by a shader. Note that this advantage doesn't translate to network bandwidth: while the formats are better than uncompressed data, they are in general far worse than standard image formats such as PNG and JPG.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持,纹理可以以压缩格式存储在视频内存中。这允许额外的细节,同时限制所需增加的视频内存。纹理在被着色器访问时,会在飞行中解压缩。需要注意的是,这种优势并不能转化为网络带宽:虽然格式比未压缩的数据要好,但总的来说,它们比PNG和JPG等标准图像格式差得多。

trans-unit.source: If that sounds a little abstract open up the vertex shader and play around with the scale factor and watch how it shrinks vertices more towards the surface. Completely change the w component values for really trippy representations of space.
trans-unit.target: 如果这听起来有点抽象,打开顶点着色器,玩玩缩放因子,看看它是如何将顶点更多地向表面收缩的。完全改变w分量的值,以获得真正的三段式空间表现。

trans-unit.source: If that succeeds, the resulting stream is assigned as the source for a <video> element which is referenced by the variable previewElement.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，则将结果流分配为 <video> 元素的源，该元素由变量 previewElement 引用。

trans-unit.source: If the dropEffect property has the value none during a dragend, then the drag was cancelled. Otherwise, the effect specifies which operation was performed. The source can use this information after a move operation to remove the dragged item from the old location. The mozUserCancelled property will be set to true if the user cancelled the drag (by pressing Escape), and false if the drag was cancelled for other reasons such as an invalid drop target, or if it was successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 dragend 期间 dropEffect 属性的值为 none ，则拖动被取消。否则，效果将指定执行哪个操作。在移动操作之后，源可以使用此信息从旧位置中删除被拖动的项目。该 mozUserCancelled 属性将被设置为true，如果用户取消拖（通过按下Esc键），假如果拖动被取消其他原因，如无效的放置目标，或者如果它是成功的。

trans-unit.target: 如果传递给 handleFiles() 的 FileList 对象为 null ，则只需将块的内部HTML设置为显示“未选择文件！”。否则，我们将开始构建文件列表，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the IdleDeadline object's didTimeout property is true, this method returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IdleDeadline 对象的 didTimeout 属性为true，则此方法返回零。

trans-unit.source: If the PaymentAddress object's addressLine property was determined to be valid, this property is not included in the AddressErrors dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定 PaymentAddress 对象的 addressLine 属性有效，则该属性不包括在 AddressErrors 词典中。

trans-unit.source: If the PaymentAddress object's country property was determined to be valid, this property is not included in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定 PaymentAddress 对象的 country 属性有效，则该属性不包含在字典中。

trans-unit.source: If the VRDisplay is already presenting when requestPresent() is called, the VRDisplay will update the VRLayer array being presented.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 VRDisplay requestPresent() 时VRDisplay已存在，则 VRDisplay 将更新所呈现的 VRLayer 数组。

trans-unit.source: If the attributes permission is true but no attributeFilter is included in the options object, all attributes' values are watched for changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 attributes 的权限是 true ，但没有 attributeFilter 在选择对象包括所有属性的值都看了更改。

trans-unit.source: If the user agent is configured not to allow automatic or script-initiated playback of media, calling play() will cause the returned promise to be immediately rejected with a "NotAllowedError". Web sites should be prepared to handle this situation. For example, a site should not present a user interface that assumes playback has begun automatically, but should instead update their UI based on whether the returned promise is resolved or rejected. See the example below for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果将用户代理配置为不允许自动或脚本启动的媒体播放，则调用 play() 将导致返回的诺言立即被拒绝，并带有 "NotAllowedError" 。网站应准备好处理这种情况。例如，站点不应提供假定回放已自动开始的用户界面，而应基于已解决或拒绝返回的承诺来更新其UI。有关更多信息，请参见下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: If the VRDevice is presenting, this method returns an array of the VRLayerInit objects currently being presented (this will currently be one, as VRDisplayCapabilities.maxLayers is currently always 1). If the VRDevice is not presenting, this method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在显示 VRDevice ，则此方法返回当前正在显示的 VRLayerInit 对象的数组（当前将是一个，因为 VRDisplayCapabilities.maxLayers 当前始终为1）。如果 VRDevice 不显示，则此方法返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: If the presentation connection state of S is connecting or connected, then abort all remaining steps.
trans-unit.target: 如果 S 的演示连接状态为正在 connecting 或已 connected ，则中止所有其余步骤。

trans-unit.source: If the signalingState is set to "closed", an InvalidStateError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果 signalingState 设置为 "closed" ，则会引发 InvalidStateError 。

trans-unit.source: If the signalingState is set to "closed", an InvalidStateError is raised. If the signalingState is set to "stable", the event negotiationneeded is sent on the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 如果 signalingState 设置为 "closed" ，则会引发 InvalidStateError 。如果 signalingState 设置为 "stable" ，则需要在 RTCPeerConnection 上发送需要 negotiationneeded 的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the icecandidate event has a non-nullcandidate property, we create a new RTCIceCandidate object from the event.candidate string and "transmit" it to the receiver by calling receiverPC.addIceCandidate(), providing the new RTCIceCandidate as its input. If addIceCandidate() fails, the catch() clause outputs the error to our log box.
trans-unit.target: 如果 icecandidate 事件具有不为 null 的 candidate 属性，我们将从 event.candidate 字符串创建一个新的 RTCIceCandidate 对象，并通过调用 RTCIceCandidate receiverPC.addIceCandidate() 将其“传输”到接收者，并提供新的RTCIceCandidate作为其输入。如果 addIceCandidate() 失败，则 catch() 子句将错误输出到我们的日志框中。

trans-unit.source: If the icecandidate event has a non-nullcandidate property, we create a new RTCIceCandidate object from the event.candidate string and deliver it to the caller by passing that into callerPC.addIceCandidate(). If addIceCandidate() fails, the catch() clause outputs the error to our log box.
trans-unit.target: 如果 icecandidate 事件具有不为 null 的 candidate 属性，我们将从 event.candidate 字符串创建一个新的 RTCIceCandidate 对象，并将其传递给 callerPC.addIceCandidate() ，将其传递给调用方。如果 addIceCandidate() 失败，则 catch() 子句将错误输出到我们的日志框中。

trans-unit.source: If the touchstart, touchmove or touchend event is canceled during an interaction, no mouse or click events will be fired, and the resulting sequence of events would just be:
trans-unit.target: 如果在交互过程中取消了 touchstart ， touchmove 或 touchend 事件，则不会触发任何鼠标或click事件，并且产生的事件序列仅为：

trans-unit.source: If the KeyboardEvent represents the press of a dead key, the key value must be "Dead".
trans-unit.target: 如果 KeyboardEvent 表示按下死键，则键值必须为“ Dead ”。

trans-unit.source: If the MediaStreamTrack represents the video input from a camera, disabling the track by setting enabled to false also updates device activity indicators to show that the camera is not currently recording or streaming. For example, the green "in use" light next to the camera in iMac and MacBook computers turns off while the track is muted in this way.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MediaStreamTrack 表示来自摄像机的视频输入，则通过将 enabled 设置为 false 来禁用轨道，还会更新设备活动指示符，以显示该摄像机当前未在录制或正在流式传输。例如，当以这种方式将轨道静音时，iMac和MacBook计算机中的摄像头旁边的绿色“正在使用”指示灯将熄灭。

trans-unit.source: If the RTCIceServer is a TURN server, then this is the username to use during the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RTCIceServer 是TURN服务器，则这是在身份验证过程中使用的用户名。

trans-unit.source: If the RTCIceServer represents a TURN server, this attribute specifies what kind of credential is to be used when connecting. This must be one of the values defined by the RTCIceCredentialType enum. The default is "password".
trans-unit.target: 如果 RTCIceServer 表示TURN服务器，则此属性指定连接时将使用哪种 credential 。这必须是 RTCIceCredentialType 枚举定义的值之一。默认值为 "password" 。

trans-unit.source: If the async attribute is absent but the defer attribute is present, then the script is executed when the page has finished parsing.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 async 属性，但是存在 defer 属性，则在页面解析完成后执行脚本。

trans-unit.source: If the async attribute is present, then the script will be executed asynchronously as soon as it downloads.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 async 属性，则脚本将在下载后立即异步执行。

trans-unit.source: If the buffer property is set to the value null, the node generates a single channel containing silence (that is, every sample is 0).
trans-unit.target: 如果 buffer 属性设置为 null ，则节点将生成一个包含静默的通道（即，每个样本为0）。

trans-unit.source: If the child doesn't exist on the DOM of the page, the method throws the following exception:
trans-unit.target: 如果该 child 项在页面的DOM上不存在，则该方法将引发以下异常：

trans-unit.target: 如果该 child 实际上是 element 的子项，因此在DOM上存在，但被删除，则该方法将引发以下异常：

trans-unit.source: If the contextType doesn't match a possible drawing context, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 contextType 与可能的绘图上下文不匹配，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: If the dependentLocality value was validated successfully, this property is not included in the AddressErrors object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dependentLocality 值已成功验证，则此属性不包括在 AddressErrors 对象中。

trans-unit.source: If the document.write() call is embedded within an inlined HTML <script> tag, then it will not call document.open(). For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果 document.write() 调用嵌入在嵌入式HTML <script> 标记内，则它将不会调用 document.open() 。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the endContainer is a Node of type Text, Comment, or CDATASection, then the offset is the number of characters from the start of the endContainer to the boundary point of the Range. For other Node types, the endOffset is the number of child nodes between the start of the endContainer and the boundary point of the Range. This property is read-only. To change the endOffset of a Range, use one of the Range.setEnd methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果 endContainer 是类型为 Text ， Comment 或 CDATASection 的 Node ，则偏移量是从 endContainer 的开始到 Range 的边界点的字符数。对于其他 Node 类型， endOffset 是介于 endContainer 的起点和 Range 的边界点之间的子节点数。该属性是只读的。要改变 endOffset 一个的 Range 的，使用一个 Range.setEnd 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the endNode is a Node of type Text, Comment, or CDATASection, then endOffset is the number of characters from the start of endNode. For other Node types, endOffset is the number of child nodes between the start of the endNode.
trans-unit.target: 如果 endNode 是类型为 Text ， Comment 或 CDATASection 的 Node ，则 endOffset 是从 endNode 开始的字符数。对于其他 Node 类型， endOffset 是endNode的开始之间的子节 endNode 。

trans-unit.source: If the gp variable has a Gamepad object inside it and it can return position values (gpPose.hasPosition), indicating a 6DoF controller, we modify the cube position using position and orientation values. If only the former is true, indicating a 3DoF controller, we modify the cube position using the orientation values only. If there is no gamepad connected, we don't modify the cube position at all.
trans-unit.target: 如果 gp 变量内部有一个 Gamepad 对象，并且它可以返回表示6DoF控制器的位置值（ gpPose.hasPosition ），则我们将使用位置和方向值来修改立方体位置。如果只有前者为真（表示3DoF控制器），我们将仅使用方向值修改立方体位置。如果没有连接游戏板，则根本不修改立方体的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the id value is not the empty string, it must be unique in a document.
trans-unit.target: 如果 id 值不是空字符串，则它在文档中必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: If the name given to this method already exists in the PerformanceTiming interface, SyntaxError is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 PerformanceTiming 接口中已经存在为此方法提供的 name ，则抛出 SyntaxError 。

trans-unit.source: If the name parameter is not valid. A valid name is any string including the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 name 参数无效。有效名称是任何字符串，包括空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the onupgradeneeded event exits successfully, the onsuccess handler of the open database request will then be triggered.
trans-unit.target: 如果 onupgradeneeded 事件成功退出， onsuccess 触发打开数据库请求的onsuccess处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If the organization value was validated successfully, this property is not included in the AddressErrors object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 organization 值已成功验证，则此属性不包括在 AddressErrors 对象中。

trans-unit.source: If the phone value was validated successfully, this property is not included in the AddressErrors object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 phone 值已成功验证，则此属性不包括在 AddressErrors 对象中。

trans-unit.source: If the playing variable indicates we're already playing the oscillators, we change the playButton's content to be the Unicode character "right-pointing triangle" (▶️) and call stopOscillators() to shut down the oscillators. See Stopping the oscillators below for that code.
trans-unit.target: 如果 playing 变量指示我们已经在播放振荡器，则将 playButton 的内容更改为Unicode字符“右指向三角形”（▶ stopOscillators() ），然后调用stopOscillators（）关闭振荡器。有关该代码，请参见下面的停止振荡器。

trans-unit.source: If the postalCode value was validated successfully, this property is not included in the AddressErrors object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 postalCode 值已成功验证，则此属性不包括在 AddressErrors 对象中。

trans-unit.source: If the recipient value was validated successfully, this property is not included in the AddressErrors object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 recipient 值已成功验证，则此属性不包括在 AddressErrors 对象中。

trans-unit.source: If the region value was validated successfully, this property is not included in the AddressErrors object.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功验证了 region 值，则此属性不包括在 AddressErrors 对象中。

trans-unit.source: If the regionCode value was validated successfully, this property is not included in the AddressErrors object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 regionCode 值已成功验证，则此属性不包含在 AddressErrors 对象中。

trans-unit.source: If the sampleRate property is not included in the options, or the options are not specified when creating the audio context, the new context's output device's preferred sample rate is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果选项中未包括 sampleRate 属性，或者在创建音频上下文时未指定选项，则默认使用新上下文的输出设备的首选采样率。

trans-unit.source: If the sortingCode value was validated successfully, this property is not included in the AddressErrors object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 sortingCode 值已成功验证，则此属性不包括在 AddressErrors 对象中。

trans-unit.source: If the startContainer is a Node of type Text, Comment, or CDATASection, then the offset is the number of characters from the start of the startContainer to the boundary point of the Range. For other Node types, the startOffset is the number of child nodes between the start of the startContainer and the boundary point of the Range.
trans-unit.target: 如果 startContainer 是类型为 Text ， Comment 或 CDATASection 的 Node ，则偏移量是从 startContainer 的起点到 Range 的边界点的字符数。对于其他 Node 类型， startOffset 是介于 startContainer 的起点和 Range 的边界点之间的子节点数。

trans-unit.source: If the startNode is a Node of type Text, Comment, or CDATASection, then startOffset is the number of characters from the start of startNode. For other Node types, startOffset is the number of child nodes between the start of the startNode.
trans-unit.target: 如果 startNode 是类型为 Text ， Comment 或 CDATASection 的 Node ，则 startOffset 是从 startNode 开始的字符数。对于其他 Node 类型， startOffset 是 startNode 开始之间的子节点数。

trans-unit.source: If the strWindowFeatures parameter is used and if no position features are defined, then the left and top coordinates of the new window dimension will be 22 pixels from where the most recently rendered window was. An offset is universally implemented by browser manufacturers (it is 29 pixels in IE6 SP2 with the default theme) and its purpose is to help users to notice new windows opening. If the most recently used window was maximized, then there is no offset: the new window will be maximized as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 strWindowFeatures 参数，并且未定义任何位置特征，则新窗口尺寸的左坐标和顶坐标将是最近渲染的窗口所在位置的22个像素。偏移量是浏览器制造商普遍实现的（在IE6 SP2中为29像素，具有默认主题），其目的是帮助用户注意到新窗口的打开。如果最近使用的窗口最大化，则没有偏移：新窗口也将最大化。

trans-unit.source: If the strWindowFeatures parameter is used and no size features are defined, then the new window dimensions will be the same as the dimensions of the most recently rendered window.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 strWindowFeatures 参数并且未定义尺寸特征，则新窗口的尺寸将与最近渲染的窗口的尺寸相同。

trans-unit.source: If the strWindowName parameter is omitted, a new window or tab is opened. If a window with the same name already exists, the existing window is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 strWindowName 参数，则将打开一个新窗口或选项卡。如果已经存在同名窗口，则刷新现有窗口。

If the MASK bit was set (and it should be, for client-to-server messages), read the next 4 octets (32 bits); this is the masking key. Once the payload length and masking key is decoded, you can go ahead and read that number of bytes from the socket. Let's call the data ENCODED, and the key MASK. To get DECODED, loop through the octets (bytes a.k.a. characters for text data) of ENCODED and XOR the octet with the (i modulo 4)th octet of MASK. In pseudo-code (that happens to be valid JavaScript):

trans-unit.source: If the ad has transitioned to the not-intersecting state, we remove the ad from the set of visible ads. Then we have one special behavior: we look to see if entry.ratio is 0.0; if it is, that means the element has become totally obscured. If that's the case, and the ad has been visible for at least a minute total, we call a function we'll create called replaceAd() to replace the existing ad with a new one. This way, the user sees a variety of ads over time, but the ads are only replaced while they can't be seen, resulting in a smooth experience.
trans-unit.target: 如果广告已转换为不相交的状态，我们将从可见广告集中删除该广告。然后，我们有一个特殊的行为：我们看看 entry.ratio 是否为0.0；如果是，则表示该元素已完全被遮盖。如果是这种情况，并且广告至少在一分钟内可见，我们调用我们将创建的函数 replaceAd() ，以将现有广告替换为新广告。这样，用户会随着时间的推移看到各种各样的广告，但是仅在看不见广告时才对其进行替换，从而带来流畅的体验。

trans-unit.source: If the array's length is zero, meaning there are no tracks left in the stream, we end the call by calling closeVideoCall(). This cleanly restores our app to a state in which it's ready to start or receive another call. See Ending the call to learn how closeVideoCall() works.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组的长度为零，则意味着流中没有剩余的轨道，我们通过调用 closeVideoCall() 结束调用。这样可以将我们的应用完全恢复到可以开始或接听另一个电话的状态。请参阅结束通话以了解 closeVideoCall() 的工作方式。

trans-unit.source: If the channel's state has changed to "open", that indicates that we have finished establishing the link between the two peers. The user interface is updated correspondingly by enabling the text input box for the message to send, focusing the input box so that the user can immediately begin to type, enabling the "Send" and "Disconnect" buttons, now that they're usable, and disabling the "Connect" button, since it is not needed when the conneciton is open.
trans-unit.target: 如果通道的状态已经变为 "打开",说明我们已经完成了两个对等体之间的链接建立。用户界面也相应地进行了更新,启用要发送消息的文本输入框,将输入框集中,使用户可以立即开始输入,启用 "发送 "和 "断开 "按钮,现在它们是可以使用的,禁用 "连接 "按钮,因为当连接打开时不需要它。

trans-unit.source: If the character encoding is declared in the HTTP Content-Type header, that character encoding is used. Failing that, if there is a byte order mark, the encoding indicated by the byte order mark is used. Failing that, if there is a <meta> element that declares the encoding within the first 1024 bytes of the file, that encoding is used. Otherwise, the file is decoded as UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 如果在HTTP Content-Type 标头中声明了字符编码，则使用该字符编码。如果没有字节序标记，则使用由字节序标记指示的编码。失败的是，如果有一个 <meta> 元素在文件的前1024个字节内声明了编码，则使用该编码。否则，文件将解码为UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: If the document has just become visible, we reverse this process: first we go through previouslyVisibleAds and set each one's dataset.lastViewStarted to the current document's time (in milliseconds since the document was created) using the performance.now() method. Then we set visibleAds back to previouslyVisibleAds and set the latter to null. Now the ads are all restarted, and configured to know that they became visible at the current time, so that they will not add up the duration of time the page was tabbed away the next time they're updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档刚刚变得可见，我们可以逆向此过程：首先，我们浏览 previouslyVisibleAds 的 dataset.lastViewStarted ，并使用 performance.now() 方法将每个人的数据集.lastViewStarted设置为当前文档的时间（自创建文档以来的毫秒数）。然后，将 visibleAds 设置回 previouslyVisibleAds ，并将后者设置为 null 。现在，所有广告均已重新启动，并进行了配置，以使其知道在当前时间可见，因此它们不会累加下次更新页面时将其分页的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: If the element at the specified point belongs to another document (for example, the document of an <iframe>), that document's parent element is returned (the <iframe> itself). If the element at the given point is anonymous or XBL generated content, such as a textbox's scroll bars, then the first non-anonymous ancestor element (for example, the textbox) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定点的元素属于另一个文档（例如， <iframe> 的文档），则返回该文档的父元素（ <iframe> 本身）。如果给定点的元素是匿名或XBL生成的内容，例如文本框的滚动条，则返回第一个非匿名祖先元素（例如，文本框）。

trans-unit.source: If the element being observed is removed from the DOM and then subsequently released by the browser's garbage collection mechanism, the MutationObserver is likewise deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果将要观察的元素从DOM中删除，然后由浏览器的垃圾回收机制释放，则同样会删除 MutationObserver 。

trans-unit.source: If the element can't be scrolled (e.g. it has no overflow or if the element has a property of "non-scrollable"), scrollTop is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素无法滚动（例如，它没有溢出或元素具有“ non-scrollable”的属性），则 scrollTop 为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If the element can't be scrolled (e.g. it has no overflow), scrollLeft is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素无法滚动（例如，没有溢出），则将 scrollLeft 设置为0。

trans-unit.source: If the element has already been initialized with media, the emptied event is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素已经使用媒体初始化，则发送 emptied 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the element is already in the process of loading media, that load process is aborted and the abort event is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素已经在加载媒体过程中，则该加载过程将被中止并发送 abort 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the element is hidden (for example, by setting style.display on the element or one of its ancestors to "none"), then 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是隐藏的（例如，通过将元素或其祖先之一的 style.display 设置为 "none" ），则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: If the element is in default mode when the descendants of the element are changed in any way, the defaultValue property is set to the value of the textContent property.
trans-unit.target: 如果以任何方式更改元素的后代时元素处于默认模式，则 defaultValue 属性将设置为 textContent 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the element whose contents are being replaced is a <template> element, then the <template> element's content attribute is replaced with the new DocumentFragment created in step 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果要替换其内容的元素是 <template> 元素，则 <template> 元素的 content 属性将替换为在步骤1中创建的新 DocumentFragment 。

trans-unit.source: If the elements in the array, or properties in the object, are themselves arrays or objects, then their elements or properties are enumerated in the row, one per column:
trans-unit.target: 如果数组中的元素或对象中的属性本身就是数组或对象,那么它们的元素或属性在行中列举,每列一个。

trans-unit.source: If the embedded origin tracker.example has already obtained first-party storage access on the top-level origin foo.example, and the user visits a page from foo.example embedding a page from tracker.example again in less than 30 days, the embedded origin will have storage access immediately when loading.
trans-unit.target: 如果嵌入式来源 tracker.example 已在顶级来源 foo.example 上获得了第一方存储访问权限，并且用户访问了 foo.example 中的页面，并且在不到30天的时间内再次嵌入了 tracker.example 中的页面，则嵌入式原始源将在加载时立即具有存储访问权限。

trans-unit.source: If the initiator is a CSS resource, the property returns "css".
trans-unit.target: 如果启动器是 CSS 资源，则属性返回“ css ”。

trans-unit.source: If the initiator is a Element, the property returns the element's localName.

trans-unit.source: If the input device isn't a physical keyboard, but is instead a virtual keyboard or accessibility device, the returned value will be set by the browser to match as closely as possible to what would happen with a physical keyboard, to maximize compatibility between physical and virtual input devices.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入设备不是物理键盘,而是虚拟键盘或可访问性设备,浏览器会将返回的值设置为尽可能接近物理键盘的情况,以最大限度地提高物理和虚拟输入设备的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: If the input hardware cannot report the contact geometry to the browser, the height defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入硬件无法将接触几何体报告给浏览器，则高度默认为 1 。

trans-unit.source: If the input hardware cannot report the contact geometry to the browser, the width defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入硬件无法将接触几何体报告给浏览器，则宽度默认为 1 。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a file, the DataTransferItem.getAsFile() method returns the drag data item's File object. If the item is not a file, this method returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项是文件，则 DataTransferItem.getAsFile() 方法将返回拖动数据项的 File 对象。如果该项目不是文件，则此方法返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: If the key cannot be identified, the returned value is "Unidentified".
trans-unit.target: 如果无法识别密钥，则返回值为 "Unidentified" 。

trans-unit.source: If the key is not a modifier key, the keypress event is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果该键不是修饰键，则发送 keypress 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the key produces a character key that would result in a character being inserted into possibly an <input>, <textarea> or an element with HTMLElement.contentEditable set to true, the beforeinput and input event types are fired in that order. Note that some other implementations may fire keypress event if supported. The events will be fired repeatedly while the key is held down.
trans-unit.target: 如果键产生的字符键可能导致将字符插入到 <input> ， <textarea> 或 HTMLElement.contentEditable 设置为true 的元素中， beforeinput 该顺序触发beforeinput和 input 事件类型。请注意，如果支持，某些其他实现可能会触发 keypress 事件。按住该键时，事件将重复触发。

trans-unit.source: If the key range is not specified or is null, then the range includes all the keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定键的范围或为空,则范围包括所有的键。

trans-unit.source: If the key range is not specified or is null, then the range includes all the records.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定键范围或者键范围为空,那么该范围包括所有记录。

trans-unit.source: If the kind of drag data item is a plain Unicode string.
trans-unit.target: 如果拖动数据项的类型是纯Unicode字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the log was scrolled to the end when we started, we make sure it still is. Then we set statusRefreshScheduled to false to indicate that we've handled the refresh and that it's safe to request a new one.
trans-unit.target: 如果在开始时将日志滚动到末尾，请确保它仍然存在。然后，将 statusRefreshScheduled 设置为 false ,以表明我们已经处理了刷新，并且可以安全地请求新的刷新。

trans-unit.source: If the media element's source isn't a MediaStream, the output from this method isn't compatible with the spec, and if you change the source after starting capture, the output capture stream can't accept the new source data due to that incompatibility, so no MediaStreamTracks from the new source MediaStream are added to the captured stream, resulting in output that doesn't capture the updated source.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体元素的源不是 MediaStream ，则此方法的输出与规范不兼容，并且如果您在开始捕获后更改了源，则由于该不兼容，输出捕获流将无法接受新的源数据，所以没有 MediaStreamTrack 从新的源极s MediaStream 被添加到所捕获的流，导致在不捕捉更新的源输出。

trans-unit.source: If the media is an audio file, the audio configuration must include a valid audio MIME type as contentType, the number of channels, the bitrate, and the sample rate. Video configurations mush include a valid video MIME type as contentType, the bitrate, and framerate, along with the width and the height of the video file. All of these must be present, as in the examples below, or a TypeError will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体是音频文件，则音频配置必须包括有效的音频MIME类型，如 contentType ，通道数，比特率和采样率。视频配置必须包括一个有效的视频MIME类型，如contentType，比特率和帧率，以及视频文件的宽度和高度。所有这些都必须存在，如以下示例所示，否则将发生TypeError。

trans-unit.source: If the merchant desires to collect additional information not part of the API (e.g., additional delivery instructions), the merchant can show a page with additional <input type="text"> fields after the checkout.
trans-unit.target: 如果商家希望收集不是API一部分的其他信息（例如，额外的交付说明），则商家可以在结帐后显示带有其他 <input type="text"> 字段的页面。

trans-unit.source: If the method is run on another document (like an <iframe>'s subdocument), the coordinates are relative to the document where the method is being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果该方法在另一个文档（例如 <iframe> 的子文档）上运行，则坐标相对于调用该方法的文档。

trans-unit.source: If the method was unable to vibrate because of invalid parameters, it will return false, else it returns true. If the pattern leads to a too long vibration, it is truncated: the max length depends on the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果该方法由于参数无效而无法振动，则将返回 false ，否则返回 true 。如果图案导致振动太长，则会将其截断：最大长度取决于实现。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse button is in fact down, we get the pressed key's dataset attribute; this makes it easy to access the custom data attributes on the element. We look for a data-pressed attribute; if there isn't one (which indicates that the note isn't already playing), we call playTone() to start playing the note, passing in the value of the element's data-frequency attribute. The returned oscillator is stored into oscList for future reference, and data-pressed is set to yes to indicate that the note is playing so we don't start it again next time this is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标按钮实际上处于按下状态，则将获得按下键的 dataset 属性。这样可以轻松访问元素上的自定义数据属性。我们寻找 data-pressed 属性；如果没有一个（表示该音符尚未播放），我们调用 playTone() 开始播放音符，并传入元素的 data-frequency 属性的值。返回的振荡器将存储到 oscList 中以供将来参考，并且 data-pressed 设置为 yes 表示该音符正在播放，因此下次调用该音符时不会再次启动它。

trans-unit.source: If the new data channel is the first one added to the connection, renegotiation is started by delivering a negotiationneeded event.
trans-unit.target: 如果新数据通道是添加到连接的第一个数据通道，则通过传递需要 negotiationneeded 事件来开始重新协商。

trans-unit.source: If the new node is a document fragment, the children of the document fragment are inserted instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果新节点是一个文档片段,则插入该文档片段的子节点。

trans-unit.source: If the new value of direction is in fact different from the existing value, renegotiation of the connection is required, so a notificationneeded event is sent to the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的值 direction 是从现有值的事实不同，连接的重新协商是必需的，所以一个 notificationneeded 事件被发送到 RTCPeerConnection 。

trans-unit.source: If the node has no element children, then children is an empty list with a length of 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点没有元素子元素，则 children 元素是一个空列表， length 为 0 。

trans-unit.target: 如果节点是CDATA节，注释，处理指令或text节点，则 textContent 返回此节点内的文本（nodeValue）。

trans-unit.source: If the object store with the given name (based on case-sensitive comparison) does not exist in the connected database.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定名称的对象存储(基于区分大小写的比较)在连接的数据库中不存在。

trans-unit.target: 如果要约创建成功，则将blob传递到本地连接的 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 方法。这将配置连接的本地端。

trans-unit.source: If the option is a descendent of a <select> element, then this property has the same value as the form property of the corresponding HTMLSelectElement object; otherwise, it is null.
trans-unit.target: 如果该选项是 <select> 元素的后代，则此属性的值与相应的 HTMLSelectElement 对象的 form 属性相同；否则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: If the origin is not a scheme/host/port tuple (say you are trying to run it locally, i.e. via file:// URL), origin will return the string "null".
trans-unit.target: 如果源不是方案/主机/端口元组（例如您尝试在本地运行，即通过 file:// URL），则 origin 将返回字符串 "null" 。
