trans-unit.target: 如果原始节点有一个ID,而克隆的节点要放在同一个文档中,那么克隆的ID应该修改为唯一的。名称属性可能也需要修改,这要看是否会出现重复的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the parent MediaSource is in its "ended"readyState, calling changeType() will transition the media source to the "open"readyState and fire a simple event named sourceopen at the parent media source.
trans-unit.target: 如果父 MediaSource 处于其 "ended" readyState 中，则调用 changeType() 会将媒体源转换为 "open" readyState ,并在父媒体源上触发一个名为 sourceopen 的简单事件。

trans-unit.source: If the payment handler validates the address and determines that the value of country is invalid, a call to PaymentRequestUpdateEvent.updateWith() will be made with a details object containing a shippingAddressErrors field. That field contains an AddressErrors-compliant object whose country property is a string indicating the validation error that occurred and, if possible, suggests how to fix it.
trans-unit.target: 如果付款处理程序验证了地址并确定 country 的值无效，则将使用包含 shippingAddressErrors 字段的 details 对象来调用 PaymentRequestUpdateEvent.updateWith() 。该字段包含一个 AddressErrors 兼容对象，其 country 属性是一个字符串，指示发生的验证错误，并在可能的情况下建议如何解决。

trans-unit.source: If the position data changes (either by device movement or if more accurate geo information arrives), you can set up a callback function that is called with that updated position information. This is done using the watchPosition() function, which has the same input parameters as getCurrentPosition(). The callback function is called multiple times, allowing the browser to either update your location as you move, or provide a more accurate location as different techniques are used to geolocate you. The error callback function, which is optional just as it is for getCurrentPosition(), can be called repeatedly.
trans-unit.target: 如果位置数据发生更改（通过设备移动或到达更准确的地理信息），则可以设置一个使用该更新的位置信息调用的回调函数。这可以使用 watchPosition() 函数完成，该函数具有与 getCurrentPosition() 相同的输入参数。多次调用该回调函数，允许浏览器在移动时更新您的位置，或者由于使用不同的技术对您进行地理位置定位而提供了更准确的位置。错误回调函数 getCurrentPosition() 对于getCurrentPosition（）而言是可选的）可以重复调用。

trans-unit.source: If the pressed key has a printed representation, the returned value is a non-empty Unicode character string containing the printable representation of the key.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下的键有打印的表示,返回的值是一个非空的Unicode字符串,包含键的可打印表示。

trans-unit.source: If the pressed key is a control or special character, the returned value is one of the pre-defined key values.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下的键是控制键或特殊字符，则返回的值是预定义键值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the promise gets resolved and a user gesture event was being processed when the function was originally called, the resolve handler will run as if a user gesture was being processed, so it will be able to call APIs that require user activation.
trans-unit.target: 如果承诺得到解析,并且在最初调用函数时,用户手势事件正在被处理,那么解析处理程序将像处理用户手势一样运行,因此它将能够调用需要用户激活的API。

trans-unit.source: If the promise gets resolved, the resolve handler will run as if a user gesture was being processed, so it will be able to call APIs that require user activation.
trans-unit.target: 如果承诺得到解析,解析处理程序将像处理用户手势一样运行,因此它将能够调用需要用户激活的API。

trans-unit.source: If the promise is rejected, the install fails, and the worker won’t do anything. This is ok, as you can fix your code and then try again the next time registration occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果诺言被拒绝，则安装将失败，并且工作人员将不会做任何事情。可以，因为您可以修复代码，然后在下次注册时再试一次。

trans-unit.source: If the promise returned by getUserMedia() concludes in a failure, our handleGetUserMediaError() function performs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 getUserMedia() 返回的承诺失败，我们的 handleGetUserMediaError() 函数将执行。

trans-unit.source: If the provided URL is not valid, a DOMException of the SYNTAX_ERROR type is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的URL是无效的，一个 DOMException 的的 SYNTAX_ERROR 类型抛出。

trans-unit.source: If the provided name is not a valid custom element name, the promise rejects with a SyntaxError.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的名称不是有效的自定义元素名称，则 SyntaxError 将拒绝，并带有SyntaxError。

trans-unit.source: If the reference node is null, the specified node is added to the end of the list of children of the specified parent node.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用节点为 null ，则将指定节点添加到指定父节点的子级列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: If the removed Attribute has a default value it is immediately replaced. The replacing attribute has the same namespace URI and local name, as well as the original prefix, when applicable.
trans-unit.target: 如果被删除的Attribute有一个默认值,它就会立即被替换。被替换的属性具有相同的命名空间URI和本地名称,以及原来的前缀(如果适用)。

trans-unit.source: If the request succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求成功。

trans-unit.source: If the requested header doesn't exist in the Headers object, it returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Headers 对象中不存在请求的标头，则它返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: If the requested object store is not in this transaction's scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的对象存储不在这个事务的范围内。

trans-unit.source: If the requested type is not image/png, but the returned value starts with data:image/png, then the requested type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的类型不是 image/png ，但是返回值以 data:image/png 开头，则不支持请求的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the resource is fetched from a local cache, or if it is a cross-origin resource, this property returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果资源是从本地缓存中获取的,或者是跨源资源,这个属性返回0。

trans-unit.source: If the resource is fetched over a secure connection, a DOMHighResTimeStamp immediately before the browser starts the handshake process to secure the current connection. If a secure connection is not used, this property returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果资源是通过安全连接获取的，则在浏览器立即开始握手过程以保护当前连接之前，将立即提供 DOMHighResTimeStamp 。如果未使用安全连接，则此属性返回零。

trans-unit.source: If the resource is retrieved from an application cache or a local resource, it must return the size of the payload body before removing any applied content-codings.
trans-unit.target: 如果资源是从应用程序缓存或本地资源中检索的,则必须在删除任何应用的内容编码之前返回有效载荷体的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the resources isn't in the cache, it is requested from the network.
trans-unit.target: 如果资源不在缓存中,则从网络上请求。

trans-unit.source: If the result of the algorithm is "Prohibits Mixed Security Contexts" and the presentation request URL of presentationRequest is an a priori unauthenticated URL, then return a Promise rejected with a SecurityError and abort these steps.
trans-unit.target: 如果算法的结果是 "Prohibits Mixed Security Contexts" 和发言请求URL的 presentationRequest 是一个先验的未经验证的URL，然后返回一个承诺拒绝，并 SecurityError 并跳过这些步骤。

trans-unit.source: If the returned promise is rejected, one of the following exceptions is provided to the rejection handler:
trans-unit.target: 如果返回的承诺被拒绝,则会向拒绝处理程序提供以下异常之一。

trans-unit.source: If the same MutationObserver is not already in use on the target, then the existing observers are left alone and the new one is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标上尚未使用相同的 MutationObserver ，则将现有的观察者保留下来，并添加新的观察者。

trans-unit.source: If the script's global object is a Window, the time origin is determined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果脚本的全局对象是 Window ，则时间起点确定如下：

trans-unit.source: If the script's global object is a WorkerGlobalScope (that is, the script is running as a web worker), the time origin is the moment at which the worker was created.
trans-unit.target: 如果脚本的全局对象是 WorkerGlobalScope （即脚本正在作为Web工作程序运行），则时间起点是创建工作程序的时刻。

trans-unit.source: If the second byte minus 128 is between 0 and 125, this is the length of the message. If it is 126, the following 2 bytes (16-bit unsigned integer), if 127, the following 8 bytes (64-bit unsigned integer, the most significant bit MUST be 0) are the length.
trans-unit.target: 如果第二个字节减128在0和125之间,这就是消息的长度。如果是126,则下面的2个字节(16位无符号整数),如果是127,则下面的8个字节(64位无符号整数,最重要的位必须是0)就是长度。

trans-unit.source: If the selector matches an ID and this ID is erroneously used several times in the document, it returns the first matching element.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择器匹配了一个ID,而这个ID在文档中被错误地使用了几次,它就会返回第一个匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the selectors specified in parameter are invalid a DOMException with a SYNTAX_ERR value is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果在参数中指定的选择器无效，则引发具有 SYNTAX_ERR 值的 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: If the server doesn't specify the Content-Type header as "text/xml" or "application/xml", you can use XMLHttpRequest.overrideMimeType() to force XMLHttpRequest to parse it as XML anyway.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器未将 Content-Type 标头指定为 "text/xml" 或 "application/xml" ，则可以使用 XMLHttpRequest.overrideMimeType() 强制 XMLHttpRequest 将其解析为XML。

trans-unit.source: If the server doesn't want to use any subprotocol, Sec-WebSocket-Protocol. Sending a blank header is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器不想使用任何子协议，请使用 Sec-WebSocket-Protocol 。发送空白标题不正确。

trans-unit.source: If the server response doesn't explicitly specify a status text, statusText will assume the default value "OK".
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器响应未明确指定状态文本，则 statusText 将采用默认值“ OK”。

trans-unit.source: If the shader was loaded and successfully compiled, the compiled shader is returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 如果shader被加载并成功编译,编译后的shader将返回给调用者。

trans-unit.source: If the site or app has the "persistent-storage" feature permission, it can use the StorageManager.persist() method to request that its box be made persistent. It's also possible for the user agent to decide to make the site's storage unit persistent due to usage characteristics or other metrics. The "persistent-storage" feature's permission-related flags, algorithms, and types are all set to the standard defaults for a permission, except that the permission state must be the same across the entire origin, and that if the permission state isn't "granted" (meaning that for whatever reason, access to the persistent storage feature was denied), the origin's site storage unit's box mode is always "best-effort".
trans-unit.target: 如果该站点或应用程序具有 "persistent-storage" 功能许可，则可以使用 StorageManager.persist() 方法来请求将其框设为持久存储。由于使用特征或其他指标，用户代理还可能决定使站点的存储单元持久化。在 "persistent-storage" 功能的许可相关的标志，算法和类型都设置为标准默认设置权限，除了许可状态必须是整个产地相同，如果允许状态不 "granted" （表示由于任何原因拒绝访问持久性存储功能），即原始站点存储单元盒模式始终 "best-effort" 。

trans-unit.source: If the source of the media is a MediaStream, this value is true if the value of the stream's active property is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体的来源是 MediaStream ，则如果流的 active 属性的值为 false ，则此值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If the specified selector matches an ID that is incorrectly used more than once in the document, the first element with that ID is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 selector 与在文档中多次被错误使用的ID匹配，则返回具有该ID的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If the specified header already exists, append() will change its value to the specified value. If the specified header already exists and accepts multiple values, append() will append the new value to the end of the value set:
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的标头已经存在，则 append() 会将其值更改为指定的值。如果指定的标头已经存在并接受多个值，则 append() 会将新值附加到值集的末尾：

trans-unit.source: If the specified header does not already exist, set() will create it and set its value to the specified value. If the specified header does already exist and does accept multiple values, set() will overwrite the existing value with the new one:
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的标头不存在，则 set() 将创建它并将其值设置为指定的值。如果指定的标头已经存在并且接受多个值，则 set() 将用新的值覆盖现有值：

trans-unit.source: If the specified point is outside the visible bounds of the document or either coordinate is negative, the result is null.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定点在文档的可见范围之外，或者任一坐标为负，则结果为 null 。

trans-unit.source: If the specified track is already in the stream's track set, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的音轨已经在流的音轨集中,本方法没有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: If the state changes to "failed", a new offer is created with iceRestart set to true, then that offer is set as the new local description for the connection. After that, the offer is sent to the server by calling a custom function sendOfferToServer().
trans-unit.target: 如果状态更改为 "failed" ， iceRestart 设置为 true 来创建一个新报价，然后将该报价设置为该连接的新本地描述。之后，通过调用自定义函数 sendOfferToServer() 将要约发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: If the state has changed to "closed", the opposite set of actions occurs: the input box and "Send" button are disabled, the "Connect" button is enabled so that the user can open a new connection if they wish to do so, and the "Disconnect" button is disabled, since it's not useful when no connection exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态变为 "关闭",则会发生一组相反的操作:输入框和 "发送 "按钮被禁用,"连接 "按钮被启用,以便用户可以在愿意的情况下打开一个新的连接,而 "断开连接 "按钮被禁用,因为在没有连接存在的情况下,它没有用处。

trans-unit.source: If the stream becomes closed, the promise will be fulfilled with an object of the form { value: undefined, done: true }.
trans-unit.target: 如果流关闭，则诺言将以 { value: undefined, done: true } 形式的对象实现。

trans-unit.source: If the stream becomes closed, the promise will be fulfilled with an object of the form { value: undefined, done: true }.
trans-unit.target: 如果流被关闭,承诺将以{value:undefined,done:true }形式的对象来实现。

trans-unit.source: If the stream becomes errored, the promise will be rejected with the relevant error.
trans-unit.target: 如果流发生错误,承诺将以相关错误被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: If the string is empty, the browser will create a new window every time (this behaviour doesn't work when the string is replaced with NULL).
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串为空,浏览器每次都会创建一个新窗口(当字符串被替换为NULL时,这种行为不起作用)。

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet is a linked style sheet, the value of its attribute is its location. For inline style sheets, the value of this attribute is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果样式表是链接的样式表，则其属性的值是其位置。对于内联样式表，此属性的值为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the sub frame doesn't have the token allow-storage-access-by-user-activation, reject.
trans-unit.target: 如果子帧不具有令牌 allow-storage-access-by-user-activation ，拒绝。

trans-unit.source: If the sub frame is not sandboxed, skip to step 7.
trans-unit.target: 如果子框架没有沙盒,请跳到步骤7。

trans-unit.source: If the sub frame's origin is equal to the main frame's, resolve.
trans-unit.target: 如果子帧的原点与主帧的原点相等,则解析。

trans-unit.source: If the sub frame's parent frame is not the top frame, reject.
trans-unit.target: 如果子帧的父帧不是顶帧,则拒绝。

trans-unit.source: If the transition is removed from its target node before the transition completes execution, the transitionend event won't be generated. One way this can happen is by changing the value of the transition-property attribute which applies to the target. Another is if the display attribute is set to "none".
trans-unit.target: 如果在转换完成执行之前将转换从其目标节点中删除，则不会生成 transitionend 事件。发生这种情况的一种方法是通过更改应用于目标的 transition-property 属性的值。另一个是将 display 属性设置为 "none" 。

trans-unit.source: If the transport was closed with an error, the RTCDataChannel is sent a NetworkError event.
trans-unit.target: 如果传输与错误关闭， RTCDataChannel 发送一个 NetworkError 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying element collection contains radio buttons, the RadioNodeList.value property represents the checked radio button. On retrieving the value property, the value of the currently checked radio button is returned as a string. If the collection does not contain any radio buttons or none of the radio buttons in the collection is in checked state, the empty string is returned. On setting the value property, the first radio button input element whose value property is equal to the new value will be set to checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础元素集合包含单选按钮，则 RadioNodeList.value 属性表示选中的单选按钮。在检索 value 属性时，当前 checked 单选按钮的 value 以字符串形式返回。如果该集合不包含任何单选按钮，或者该集合中的所有单选按钮均未处于 checked 状态，则返回空字符串。在设置 value 属性时，其 value 属性等于新值的第一个单选按钮输入元素将被设置为 checked 。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying element collection contains radio buttons, the value property represents the checked radio button. On retrieving the value property, the value of the currently checked radio button is returned as a string. If the collection does not contain any radio buttons or none of the radio buttons in the collection is in checked state, the empty string is returned. On setting the value property, the first radio button input element whose value property is equal to the new value will be set to checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础元素集合包含单选按钮，则 value 属性表示选中的单选按钮。在检索 value 属性时，当前 checked 单选按钮的 value 以字符串形式返回。如果该集合不包含任何单选按钮，或者该集合中的所有单选按钮均未处于 checked 状态，则返回空字符串。在设置 value 属性时，其 value 属性等于新值的第一个单选按钮输入元素将被设置为 checked 。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying index or object store does not support updating the record because it is open in the READ_ONLY or SNAPSHOT_READ mode, or if an index record cannot be changed because the underlying index is auto-populated.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础索引或对象存储不支持更新记录，因为它以 READ_ONLY 或 SNAPSHOT_READ 模式打开，或者由于基础索引是自动填充的，所以无法更改索引记录。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying index or object store does not support updating the record because it is open in the READ_ONLY or SNAPSHOT_READ mode.

trans-unit.target: 如果用户只选择一个文件,那么只需要考虑列表中的第一个文件。

trans-unit.source: If the user's finger wanders into browser UI, or the touch otherwise needs to be canceled, the pointercancel event is sent, and we call the handleCancel() function below.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户的手指进入浏览器用户界面，或者需要取消触摸， pointercancel 发送pointercancel事件，我们在下面调用 handleCancel() 函数。

trans-unit.source: If the value for utfLabel is unknown, or is one of the two values leading to a 'replacement' decoding algorithm ( "iso-2022-cn" or "iso-2022-cn-ext"), a DOMException with the "TypeError" value is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果utfLabel的值未知，或者是导致 'replacement' 解码算法的两个值之一（“ iso-2022-cn ”或“ iso-2022-cn-ext ”）， DOMException 带有 "TypeError" 的DOMException值被抛出。

trans-unit.target: 如果 latencyHint 属性的值无效，则Chrome会引发 TypeError 异常，并显示消息“提供的值'...'不是AudioContextLatencyCategory类型的有效枚举值”。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the parameter is invalid, a DOMException with a NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR code is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数的值无效，则将引发带有 NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR 代码的 DOMException 。

trans-unit.target: 如果指定对象的 candidate 是一个空字符串（ "" ），则表示已发送了所有远程候选（候选结束）。

trans-unit.source: If the writer is active, the abort() method behaves the same as that for the associated stream (WritableStream.abort()). If not, it returns a rejected promise.

trans-unit.source: If the writer is active, the abort() method behaves the same as that for the associated stream (WriteableStream.abort()). If not, it returns a rejected promise.

trans-unit.source: If there are HTTP redirects the property returns the time immediately before the user agent starts to fetch the final resource in the redirection.
trans-unit.target: 如果有HTTP重定向,该属性返回紧接在用户代理开始获取重定向中的最终资源之前的时间。

trans-unit.source: If there are HTTP redirects when fetching the resource and if any of the redirects are not from the same origin as the current document, but the timing allow check algorithm passes for each redirected resource, this property returns the starting time of the fetch that initiates the redirect; otherwise, zero is returned.

trans-unit.source: If there are too few easing or composite values, the corresponding list will be repeated as needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 easing 值或 composite 值太少，则将根据需要重复相应的列表。

trans-unit.source: If there is a match and it is fresh, it will be returned from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在匹配项并且它是新鲜的，它将从缓存中返回。

trans-unit.source: If there is a match but it is stale, the browser will make a conditional request to the remote server. If the server indicates that the resource has not changed, it will be returned from the cache. Otherwise the resource will be downloaded from the server and the cache will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在匹配项但过时，浏览器将向远程服务器发出条件请求。如果服务器指示资源未更改，则将从缓存中将其返回。否则，将从服务器上下载资源，并更新缓存。

trans-unit.source: If there is a match, fresh or stale, if will be returned from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在匹配项，则将从缓存中返回fresh或stale。

trans-unit.source: If there is a match, fresh or stale, it will be returned from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果有匹配项，fresh或stale，它将从缓存中返回。

trans-unit.source: If there is a match, fresh or stale, the browser will make a conditional request to the remote server. If the server indicates that the resource has not changed, it will be returned from the cache. Otherwise the resource will be downloaded from the server and the cache will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果匹配，新鲜或过时，浏览器将向远程服务器发出条件请求。如果服务器指示资源未更改，则将从缓存中将其返回。否则，将从服务器上下载资源，并更新缓存。

trans-unit.source: If there is a possibility that your logic could take longer to execute than the interval time, it is recommended that you recursively call a named function using WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.setTimeout. For example, if using setInterval to poll a remote server every 5 seconds, network latency, an unresponsive server, and a host of other issues could prevent the request from completing in its allotted time. As such, you may find yourself with queued up XHR requests that won't necessarily return in order.
trans-unit.target: 如果逻辑执行时间可能比间隔时间长，则建议您使用 WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.setTimeout 递归调用命名函数。例如，如果使用 setInterval 每5秒轮询一次远程服务器，则网络延迟，服务器无响应以及许多其他问题可能会阻止请求在其分配的时间内完成。这样，您可能会发现自己排队的XHR请求不一定按顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: If there is an error linking the program or you wish to delete an existing program, then it is as simple as running WebGLRenderingContext.deleteProgram(). This frees the memory of the linked program.
trans-unit.target: 如果链接程序时出错，或者您希望删除现有程序，则就像运行 WebGLRenderingContext.deleteProgram() 一样简单。这将释放链接程序的内存。

trans-unit.source: If there is an existing service worker available, the new version is installed in the background, but not yet activated — at this point it is called the worker in waiting. It is only activated when there are no longer any pages loaded that are still using the old service worker. As soon as there are no more pages to be loaded, the new service worker activates (becoming the active worker). Activation can happen sooner using ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.skipWaiting() and existing pages can be claimed by the active worker using Clients.claim().
trans-unit.target: 如果有可用的现有服务人员，则新版本会在后台安装，但尚未激活-在这一点上，它称为等待中的人员。仅当不再有任何页面仍在使用旧服务工作程序时才激活它。一旦没有更多页面要加载，新的服务工作程序即会激活（成为活动工作程序）。使用 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.skipWaiting() 可以更快地进行激活，活动的工作人员可以使用 Clients.claim() 声明现有页面。

trans-unit.source: If there is more stream to read, you process the current chunk then run the function again.
trans-unit.target: 如果有更多的流需要读取,你会处理当前的块,然后再次运行该函数。

trans-unit.source: If there is no element with the given id, this function returns null. Note that the id parameter is case-sensitive, so document.getElementById("Main") will return null instead of the element <div id="main"> because "M" and "m" are different for the purposes of this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有具有给定 id 的元素，则此函数返回 null 。请注意， id 参数区分大小写，因此 document.getElementById("Main") 将返回 null 而不是元素 <div id="main"> 因为“ M”和“ m”在以下方面有所不同这种方法。

trans-unit.source: If there is no match, the browser will make a normal request, and will update the cache with the downloaded resource.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配,浏览器会进行正常请求,并将下载的资源更新缓存。

trans-unit.source: If there is no match, the browser will respond with a 504 Gateway timeout status.
trans-unit.target: 如果不匹配，浏览器将以504网关超时状态响应。

trans-unit.source: If there is no more stream to read, you return out of the function.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有更多的流可读,你就返回出函数。

trans-unit.source: If there is no running timer, timeLog() returns the warning:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有正在运行的计时器，则 timeLog() 返回警告：

trans-unit.source: If there isn't a preferred style sheet set defined by the author, the empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有作者定义的首选样式表,则返回空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: If there isn't a valid image available (that is, the width and height are both 0), we clear the contents of the captured frame box by calling clearphoto().
trans-unit.target: 如果没有可用的有效图像（即 width 和 height 均为0），我们将通过调用 clearphoto() 清除捕获的帧框的内容。

trans-unit.source: If this DOMString is present in the object, the PaymentResponse.payerName property failed validation, and this string explains what needs to be corrected. If this property is absent, the paer name is fine
trans-unit.target: 如果对象中存在此 DOMString ，则 PaymentResponse.payerName 属性验证失败，并且此字符串说明需要更正的内容。如果没有此属性，则可以使用paer名称

trans-unit.source: If this animation is canceled, remove its element.
trans-unit.target: 如果该动画被取消,则删除其元素。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is anything else, the default value for image quality is used. The default value is 0.92. Other arguments are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为其他参数，则使用图像质量的默认值。默认值为 0.92 。其他参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If this argument's value is on, yes, or 1, the dialog window can be resized by the user; otherwise its size is fixed. The default value is no.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数的值为 on ， yes 或1，则用户可以调整对话框窗口的大小。否则其大小是固定的。默认值为 no 。

trans-unit.source: If this argument's value is on, yes, or 1, the dialog window has scroll bars; otherwise its size is fixed. The default value is no.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数的值为 on ， yes 或1，则对话框窗口具有滚动条。否则其大小是固定的。默认值为 no 。

trans-unit.source: If this argument's value is on, yes, or 1, the dialog window is centered on the desktop; otherwise it's hidden. The default value is yes.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数的值为 on ， yes 或1，则对话框窗口位于桌面的中心；否则它是隐藏的。默认值为 yes 。

trans-unit.source: If this fails (e.g. because the network is down), return a fallback response.
trans-unit.target: 如果失败(例如,因为网络瘫痪),返回一个回退响应。

trans-unit.source: If this fails (e.g., because the network is down), return a fallback response.
trans-unit.target: 如果失败了(例如,因为网络中断),返回一个回退响应。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is on, the new secondary window will be resizable.
trans-unit.target: 如果开启此功能,新的辅助窗口将可调整大小。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is on, the new secondary window will show horizontal and/or vertical scrollbar(s) if the document doesn't fit into the window's viewport.
trans-unit.target: 如果此功能开启,如果文档不适合窗口的视口,新的辅助窗口将显示水平和/或垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is on, then the new secondary window has a status bar. Users can force the rendering of status bar in all Mozilla-based browsers, in MSIE 6 SP2 (Note on status bar in XP SP2) and in Opera 6+. The default preference setting in recent Mozilla-based browser releases and in Firefox 1.0 is to force the presence of the status bar.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用此功能，则新的辅助窗口具有状态栏。用户可以在所有基于Mozilla的浏览器，MSIE 6 SP2（在XP SP2中注意状态栏）和Opera 6+中强制显示状态栏。在最近的基于Mozilla的浏览器版本和Firefox 1.0中，默认首选项设置是强制显示状态栏。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is on, then the new secondary window renders the Location bar in Mozilla-based browsers. MSIE 5+ and Opera 7.x renders the Address Bar.
trans-unit.target: 如果此功能开启,那么在基于Mozilla的浏览器中,新的辅助窗口会渲染地址栏。MSIE 5+和Opera 7.x则会渲染地址栏。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is on, then the new secondary window renders the Navigation Toolbar (Back, Forward, Reload, Stop buttons). In addition to the Navigation Toolbar, Mozilla-based browsers will render the Tab Bar if it is visible, present in the parent window. (If this feature is set to <var>no</var> all toolbars in the window will be invisible, for example extension toolbars).
trans-unit.target: 如果启用此功能，则新的辅助窗口将呈现“导航工具栏”（“后退”，“前进”，“重新加载”，“停止”按钮）。除了导航工具栏外，基于Mozilla的浏览器还将渲染父窗口中出现的选项卡栏（如果可见）。（如果将此功能设置为 <var>no</var> ，则窗口中的所有工具栏都不可见，例如扩展工具栏）。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is on, then the new secondary window renders the Personal Toolbar in Netscape 6.x, Netscape 7.x and Mozilla browser. It renders the Bookmarks Toolbar in Firefox. In addition to the Personal Toolbar, Mozilla browser will render the Site Navigation Bar if such toolbar is visible, present in the parent window.
trans-unit.target: 如果此功能开启,那么新的辅助窗口会在Netscape 6.x、Netscape 7.x和Mozilla浏览器中渲染个人工具栏。在Firefox浏览器中,它会渲染书签工具栏。除了个人工具栏,Mozilla浏览器还将渲染网站导航栏,如果这种工具栏在父窗口中可见的话。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is on, then the new secondary window renders the menubar.
trans-unit.target: 如果该功能开启,那么新的辅助窗口就会渲染menubar。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is set, the newly-opened window will open as normal, except that it will not have access back to the originating window (via Window.opener — it returns null). In addition, the window.open() call will also return null, so the originating window will not have access to the new one either. This is useful for preventing untrusted sites opened via window.open() from tampering with the originating window, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此功能，则新打开的窗口将正常打开，除了它将无法访问原始窗口（通过 Window.opener －返回 null ）。此外， window.open() 调用还将返回 null ，因此原始窗口也将无法访问新窗口。这有助于防止通过 window.open() 打开的不受信任的站点篡改原始窗口，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: If this feature is specified, the window is able to open even if another application is already in the foreground. This feature is for Firefox OS applications only, and is currently restricted to certified applications. See Internal (Certified) app permissions in App permissions for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了此功能，则即使在前台已经有另一个应用程序，也可以打开窗口。此功能仅适用于Firefox OS应用程序，目前仅限于经过认证的应用程序。有关更多信息，请参阅应用程序权限中的内部（已认证）应用程序权限。

trans-unit.source: If this is indeed the first run, we set the video's height based on the size difference between the video's actual size, video.videoWidth, and the width at which we're going to render it, width.
trans-unit.target: 如果这确实是第一次运行，我们设定基于视频的实际尺寸之间的尺寸差视频的高度 video.videoWidth ，在这我们要使它的宽度 width 。

trans-unit.source: If this is the first time a service worker has been made available, installation is attempted, then after a successful installation, it is activated.
trans-unit.target: 如果是第一次提供服务工,则尝试安装,安装成功后,再激活。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called with no arguments or the format is an empty string, the data of all types will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不带任何参数调用此方法，或者格式为空 string ，则将删除所有类型的数据。

trans-unit.source: If this object exists on another origin to the constructor call, the Request.referrer is stripped out.
trans-unit.target: 如果此对象存在于构造函数调用的另一个源上，则将剥离 Request.referrer 。

trans-unit.source: If this object has a Request.mode of navigate, the mode value is converted to same-origin.
trans-unit.target: 如果该对象具有 Request.mode 的 navigate ，该 mode 值被转换为 same-origin 。

trans-unit.source: If this object store uses out-of-line keys, and the key parameter was not passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此对象库使用离线键，并且未传递key参数。

trans-unit.source: If this object store uses out-of-line keys and no key generator, but no key was given.
trans-unit.target: 如果此对象存储使用离线键，并且不使用键生成器，但未提供任何键。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is provided, the copy is given this string as its new file or directory name.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了这个参数,则拷贝会被赋予这个字符串作为它的新文件或目录名。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is provided, the entry is renamed to have this string as its new file or directory name.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了这个参数,条目将被重命名为使用这个字符串作为新的文件或目录名称。

trans-unit.source: If this property exists on the options object when the MutationObserver() constructor is used to create a new MutationObserver, attribute monitoring is enabled regardless of whether or not the attributes property is true.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 MutationObserver() 构造函数创建新的 MutationObserver 时，如果选项对象上存在此属性，则无论 attributes 属性是否为 true ，都将启用属性监视。

trans-unit.source: If this property has a value, the HTMLLabelElement.control property must refer to the same control.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性具有值，则 HTMLLabelElement.control 属性必须引用相同的控件。

trans-unit.source: If this property has a value, the HTMLLabelElement.htmlFor property must refer to the same control.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性具有值，则 HTMLLabelElement.htmlFor 属性必须引用相同的控件。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, and the requested file or directory doesn't exist, the user agent should create it. The default is false. The parent directory must already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 true ，并且请求的文件或目录不存在，则用户代理应创建它。默认值为 false 。父目录必须已经存在。

trans-unit.source: If this property is missing when the DOMPointInit object is passed into fromPoint(), the value is assumed to be 0 by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 DOMPointInit 对象传递给 fromPoint() 时缺少此属性，则默认情况下该值为0。

trans-unit.source: If this property is null, the application must provide a key for each modification operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为空,应用程序必须为每个修改操作提供一个密钥。

trans-unit.source: If this property is present, its value is always true.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在此属性，则其值始终为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If this property is successfully set, the port part of the origin is also set to null.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性设置成功,则原点的端口部分也被设置为空。

trans-unit.source: If this property's value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose latency tends to be as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainDouble will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required latency (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值为一个数字，则在给定硬件功能和指定的其他限制的情况下，用户代理将尝试获取其延迟趋于尽可能接近此数字的媒体。否则，此值 ConstrainDouble 将指导在努力提供精确匹配所需的延迟的用户代理（如果 exact 指定或两者 min 和 max 设置，并具有相同的值），或一个最佳可能值。

trans-unit.source: If this style sheet is imported into the document using an @import rule, the ownerRule property will return that CSSImportRule, otherwise it returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 @import 规则将此样式表导入文档，则 ownerRule 属性将返回该 CSSImportRule ，否则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: If this transaction has already been committed or aborted.
trans-unit.target: 如果该交易已经被提交或中止。

trans-unit.source: If this transaction's scope is dynamic, and the browser cannot commit all of the changes due to another transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个事务的作用域是动态的,而浏览器不能因为另一个事务而提交所有的变化。

trans-unit.source: If this value is false, the children of entity reference nodes (as well as all of their descendants) are rejected. This takes precedence over the value of the TreeWalker.whatToShow method and the associated filter.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为 false ，则拒绝实体引用节点的子代（及其所有后代）。这优先于 TreeWalker.whatToShow 方法和关联的过滤器的值。

trans-unit.source: If this value is false, the shadow root will be the last node to be offered the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为 false ，则影子根将是要提供该事件的最后一个节点。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose aspect ratio is as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainDouble will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required aspect ratio (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为数字，则在硬件功能和指定的其他限制条件下，用户代理将尝试获取长宽比尽可能接近此数字的媒体。否则，此值 ConstrainDouble 将指导在努力提供精确匹配所需的纵横比的用户代理（如果 exact 指定或两者 min 和 max 设置，并具有相同的值），或一个最佳的可能值。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose channel count is as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainLong will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required channel count (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为数字，则在硬件功能和指定的其他限制条件下，用户代理将尝试获取其通道数尽可能接近此数字的媒体。否则，此值 ConstrainLong 将指导在努力提供精确匹配到需要的信道数的用户代理（如果 exact 指定或两者 min 和 max 设置，并具有相同的值），或一个最佳的可能值。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose frame rate is as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainDouble will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required frame rate (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为数字，则在硬件功能和指定的其他限制条件下，用户代理将尝试获取帧速率尽可能接近此数字的媒体。否则，此值 ConstrainDouble 将指导在努力提供精确匹配到需要的帧速率的用户代理（如果 exact 指定或两者 min 和 max 设置，并具有相同的值），或一个最佳的可能值。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose height is as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainLong will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required height (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为数字，则在硬件功能和指定的其他限制条件下，用户代理将尝试获取高度尽可能接近此数字的媒体。否则，此值 ConstrainLong 将指导在努力提供精确匹配所需的高度的用户代理（如果 exact 指定或两者 min 和 max 设置，并具有相同的值），或一个最佳可能值。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose sample rate is as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainLong will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required sample rate (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为数字，则在硬件功能和指定的其他限制条件下，用户代理将尝试获取采样率尽可能接近此数字的媒体。否则，此 ConstrainLong 的值将指导用户代理努力提供与所需采样率的精确匹配（如果指定了 exact 值，或者提供了 min 和 max 且具有相同值）或最佳可能值。 。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose sample size (in bits per linear sample) is as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainLong will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required sample size (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为数字，则在硬件功能和指定的其他限制条件下，用户代理将尝试获取其样本大小（每个线性样本的位数）尽可能接近该数字的媒体。否则，此 ConstrainLong 的值将指导用户代理努力提供与所需样本量的精确匹配（如果指定了 exact 值，或者提供了 min 和 max 且具有相同值）或最佳可能值。 。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose volume is as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainDouble will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required volume (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为数字，则在给定硬件功能和指定的其他限制的情况下，用户代理将尝试获取其容量尽可能接近此数字的媒体。否则，此 ConstrainDouble 的值将指导用户代理努力提供与所需体积的精确匹配（如果指定了 exact 值，或者提供了 min 和 max 且具有相同值）或最佳可能值。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a number, the user agent will attempt to obtain media whose width is as close as possible to this number given the capabilities of the hardware and the other constraints specified. Otherwise, the value of this ConstrainLong will guide the user agent in its efforts to provide an exact match to the required width (if exact is specified or both min and max are provided and have the same value) or to a best-possible value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为数字，则在硬件功能和指定的其他限制条件下，用户代理将尝试获取宽度尽可能接近此数字的媒体。否则，此值 ConstrainLong 将指导在努力提供精确匹配所需宽度的用户代理（如果 exact 指定或两者 min 和 max 设置，并具有相同的值），或一个最佳可能值。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a simple true or false, the user agent will attempt to obtain media with automatic gain control enabled or disabled as specified, if possible, but will not fail if this can't be done. If, instead, the value is given as an object with an exact field, that field's Boolean value indicates a required setting for the automatic gain control feature; if it can't be met, then the request will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值是简单的 true 或 false ，则用户代理将尝试获取已启用或禁用自动增益控制的媒体（如果可能的话），如果可能的话，但不会失败。取而代之的是，如果该值作为具有 exact 字段的对象给出，则该字段的布尔值表示自动增益控制功能的必需设置；否则，默认值为0。如果无法满足，则请求将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a simple true or false, the user agent will attempt to obtain media with echo cancellation enabled or disabled as specified, if possible, but will not fail if this can't be done. If, instead, the value is given as an object with an exact field, that field's Boolean value indicates a required setting for the echo cancellation feature; if it can't be met, then the request will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值是简单的 true 或 false ，则用户代理将尝试获取指定启用或禁用回声消除的媒体（如果可能的话），但不会失败。相反，如果该值作为具有 exact 字段的对象给出，则该字段的布尔值表示回声消除功能的必需设置；如果无法满足，则请求将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: If this value is a simple true or false, the user agent will attempt to obtain media with noise suppression enabled or disabled as specified, if possible, but will not fail if this can't be done. trans-unit.source: If we compare clipping paths to the globalCompositeOperation property we've seen above, we see two compositing modes that achieve more or less the same effect in source-in and source-atop. The most important differences between the two are that clipping paths are never actually drawn to the canvas and the clipping path is never affected by adding new shapes. This makes clipping paths ideal for drawing multiple shapes in a restricted area.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们将剪切路径与上面看到的 globalCompositeOperation 属性进行比较，我们将看到两种合成模式，它们在 source-in 和 source-atop 中或多或少地获得了相同的效果。两者之间最重要的区别在于，剪切路径实际上不会绘制到画布上，并且剪切路径也不会受到添加新形状的影响。这使得剪切路径非常适合在受限区域中绘制多种形状。

trans-unit.source: If we were being really clever, we would not only request the resource from the network; we would also save it into the cache so that later requests for that resource could be retrieved offline too! This would mean that if extra images were added to the Star Wars gallery, our app could automatically grab them and cache them. The following would do the trick:

trans-unit.source: If we're not replacing an existing ad, we need to append the element to the content area of the page using Document.appendChild(). If we're replacing an ad, it's already there, with its contents replaced with the new ad's. Then we call the observe() method on our Intersection Observer, adObserver, to start watching the ad for changes to its intersection with the viewport. From now on, any time the ad becomes 100% obscured or even a single pixel becomes visible, or the ad passes through 75% visible in one way or another, the observer's callback is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们不替换现有广告，则需要使用 Document.appendChild() 将元素添加到页面的内容区域。如果要替换广告，则该广告已经存在，其内容已替换为新广告。然后，我们在Intersection Observer adObserver 上调用 observe() 方法，开始观察广告与视口的交集的变化。从现在开始，只要广告被100％遮盖，甚至单个像素变得可见，或者广告以某种方式通过75％可见，都将执行观察者的回调。

trans-unit.source: If you are working with 3D games and/or WebXR it's a good idea to harness a 3D library to create such functionality, rather than trying to do this all yourself from first principles. We rolled our own in this article to give you an idea of how it works, but you'll save a lot of time by taking advantage of work others have done before you.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在使用3D游戏和/或WebXR,那么利用一个3D库来创建这样的功能是个好主意,而不是试图自己从第一原则开始做起。我们在这篇文章中推出了我们自己的库,让你了解它是如何工作的,但是你可以通过利用别人在你之前所做的工作来节省很多时间。

trans-unit.source: If you aren't familiar with the programming basics, you might want to consult some beginner's JavaScript tutorials first and then come back here — see our Beginner's JavaScript learning module for a great place to begin.

trans-unit.source: If you conclude with an XMLHttpRequest receiving status=0 and statusText=null, this means the request was not allowed to be performed. It was UNSENT. A likely cause for this is when the XMLHttpRequest origin (at the creation of the XMLHttpRequest) has changed when the XMLHttpRequest is subsequently open(). This case can happen, for example, when one has an XMLHttpRequest that gets fired on an onunload event for a window, the expected XMLHttpRequest is created when the window to be closed is still there, and finally sending the request (in otherwords, open()) when this window has lost its focus and another window gains focus. The most effective way to avoid this problem is to set a listener on the new window's activate event which is set once the terminated window has its unload event triggered.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后以XMLHttpRequest接收 status=0 和 statusText=null ，则意味着不允许执行该请求。这是 UNSENT 。造成这种情况的可能原因是，当XMLHttpRequest随后被 open() 时， XMLHttpRequest 的来源（在XMLHttpRequest的创建时）发生了变化。例如，当有人有一个XMLHttpRequest在窗口的onunload事件上触发时，可能会发生这种情况，当要关闭的窗口仍然存在时会创建预期的XMLHttpRequest，最后发送请求（换句话说，就是 open() ），当该窗口失去焦点而另一个窗口获得焦点时。避免此问题的最有效方法是，在终止窗口触发其 unload 事件后，在新窗口的 activate 事件上设置一个侦听器。

trans-unit.source: If you consider a path from (3,1) to (3,5) with a line thickness of 1.0, you end up with the situation in the second image. The actual area to be filled (dark blue) only extends halfway into the pixels on either side of the path. An approximation of this has to be rendered, which means that those pixels being only partially shaded, and results in the entire area (the light blue and dark blue) being filled in with a color only half as dark as the actual stroke color. This is what happens with the 1.0 width line in the previous example code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您考虑从（3,1）到（3,5）的线宽为 1.0 的路径，则最终会出现第二个图像中的情况。实际要填充的区域（深蓝色）仅延伸到路径两侧的像素的一半。必须对此进行近似处理，这意味着这些像素仅被部分阴影化，并导致整个区域（浅蓝色和深蓝色）被填充的颜色仅为实际笔触颜色的一半。这就是上一个示例代码中的 1.0 宽度行发生的情况。

trans-unit.source: If you do expect to receive messages from other sites, always verify the sender's identity using the origin and possibly source properties. Any window (including, for example, http://evil.example.com) can send a message to any other window, and you have no guarantees that an unknown sender will not send malicious messages. Having verified identity, however, you still should always verify the syntax of the received message. Otherwise, a security hole in the site you trusted to send only trusted messages could then open a cross-site scripting hole in your site.
trans-unit.target: 如果您确实希望从其他站点接收消息，请始终使用 origin 和可能的 source 属性验证发件人的身份。任何窗口（包括例如 http://evil.example.com ）都可以将消息发送到任何其他窗口，并且您不能保证未知发件人不会发送恶意消息。但是，在验证了身份之后，您仍然应该始终验证接收到的消息的语法。否则，您信任的仅发送受信任消息的站点中的安全漏洞可能会在您的站点中打开跨站点脚本漏洞。

trans-unit.source: If you do not require explicit control of video quality over time, the rate at which content is fetched, or the rate at which memory is evicted, then the <video> and <source> tags may well be a simple and adequate solution.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要随时间明确控制视频质量，获取内容的速率或收回内存的速率，则 <video> 和 <source> 标签很可能是一种简单而适当的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: If you don't provide certificates, new ones are generated automatically. One obvious benefit to providing your own is identity key continuity—if you use the same certificate for subsequent calls, the remote peer can tell you're the same caller. This also avoids the cost of generating new keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不提供证书，则会自动生成新证书。提供自己的身份的明显好处是身份密钥连续性-如果您对后续呼叫使用相同的证书，则远程对等方可以告诉您是同一呼叫者。这也避免了产生新密钥的成本。

trans-unit.source: If you don't want any user interaction you can use the setInterval() function which repeatedly executes the supplied code. If we wanted to make a game, we could use keyboard or mouse events to control the animation and use setTimeout(). By setting EventListeners, we catch any user interaction and execute our animation functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不希望任何用户交互，则可以使用 setInterval() 函数，该函数重复执行所提供的代码。如果要制作游戏，可以使用键盘或鼠标事件来控制动画并使用 setTimeout() 。通过设置 EventListener ，我们可以捕获任何用户交互并执行动画功能。

trans-unit.source: If you dont want to create a history entry, replace open() with open("text/html", "replace").
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想创建历史记录条目，请将 open() 替换为 open("text/html", "replace") 。

trans-unit.source: If you find yourself repeating some of the same drawing operations on each animation frame, consider offloading them to an offscreen canvas. You can then render the offscreen image to your primary canvas as often as needed, without unnecessarily repeating the steps needed to generate it in the first place.
trans-unit.target: 如果您发现自己在每个动画帧上重复一些相同的绘图操作,请考虑将它们卸载到非屏幕画布上。然后,您可以根据需要频繁地将离屏图像渲染到您的主画布上,而不必不必要地重复当初生成图像所需的步骤。

trans-unit.source: If you have a FileSystemFileEntry corresponding to an image file in a file system available to your Web site or app, you can call toURL() to get its URL for use in HTML. If your site is located at http://my-awesome-website.woot, and you have a temporary file system that contains an image file named awesomesauce.jpg, the URL returned by toURL() might be (depending on the browser's implementation) something like "filesystem:http://my-awesome-website.woot/temporary/awesomesauce.jpg".
trans-unit.target: 如果您的网站或应用程序可用的文件系统中具有与图像文件相对应的 FileSystemFileEntry ，则可以调用 toURL() 获取其URL以在HTML中使用。如果您的站点位于 http://my-awesome-website.woot ，并且您有一个临时文件系统，其中包含名为 awesomesauce.jpg 的图像文件，则 toURL() 返回的URL 可能是（取决于浏览器的实现），例如 "filesystem:http://my-awesome-website.woot/temporary/awesomesauce.jpg" 。

trans-unit.source: If you have a static background image, you can draw it onto a plain <div> element using the CSS background property and position it under the canvas. This will negate the need to render the background to the canvas on every tick.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有静态背景图片，则可以使用CSS background 属性将其绘制到普通的 <div> 元素上，并将其放置在画布下。这样就无需在每个刻度上将背景渲染到画布上。

trans-unit.source: If you have buttons that switch audio on and off, using the ARIA role="switch" attribute on them is a good option for signalling to assistive technology what the button's exact purpose is, and therefore making the app more accessible. There's a demo of how to use it here.

trans-unit.source: If you must ensure durability for some reason (e.g. you're storing critical data that cannot be recomputed later) you can force a transaction to flush to disk before delivering the complete event by creating a transaction using the experimental (non-standard) readwriteflush mode (see IDBDatabase.transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于某种原因必须确保持久性（例如，您存储的关键数据以后无法重新计算），则可以通过使用实验性（非标准） readwriteflush 模式创建事务来强制事务在交付 complete 事件之前先刷新到磁盘。（请参阅 IDBDatabase.transaction 。

trans-unit.source: If you need a list of all elements matching the specified selectors, you should use querySelectorAll() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要与指定选择器匹配的所有元素的列表，则应改用 querySelectorAll() 。

trans-unit.source: If you need all the elements matching the selector list, use querySelectorAll() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要与选择器列表匹配的所有元素，请改用 querySelectorAll() 。

trans-unit.source: If you need an integer value, you can use Math.round() to round it off.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要整数值，可以使用 Math.round() 进行四舍五入。

trans-unit.source: If you need higher performance and don't care about precision, you can use AnalyserNode.getByteFrequencyData() instead, which works on a Uint8Array.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要更高的性能并且不关心精度，则可以改用 AnalyserNode.getByteFrequencyData() ，该方法可在 Uint8Array 上使用。

trans-unit.source: If you need only a single result, consider the querySelector() method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果只需要一个结果，请考虑使用 querySelector() 方法。

trans-unit.target: 如果您需要或想查看是否支持特定的MIME类型，也可以。只需调用 MediaRecorder.isTypeSupported() 即可。

A normal cursor maps the index property to the object in the object store. A key cursor maps the index property to the key used to store the object in the object store. trans-unit.source: If you need to change the configuration of the connection in some way (such as changing to a different set of ICE servers), you can do so before restarting ICE by calling RTCPeerConnection.setConfiguration() with an updated RTCConfiguration dictionary before restarting ICE.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要以某种方式更改连接的配置（例如更改为一组不同的ICE服务器），则可以在重新启动ICE之前执行此操作，方法是在重新启动ICE之前使用更新的 RTCConfiguration 字典调用 RTCPeerConnection.setConfiguration() 。

trans-unit.source: If you need to find the specific position inside the element, use Document.caretPositionFromPoint().
trans-unit.target: 如果需要查找元素内的特定位置，请使用 Document.caretPositionFromPoint() 。

trans-unit.source: If you need to get access to an element which doesn't have an ID, you can use querySelector() to find the element using any selector.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要访问没有ID的元素，则可以使用 querySelector() 通过任何选择器查找该元素。

trans-unit.source: If you need to get the raw string of all of the headers, use the getAllResponseHeaders() method, which returns the entire raw header string.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要获取所有标头的原始字符串，请使用 getAllResponseHeaders() 方法，该方法返回整个原始标头字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you need to know how much space the actual displayed content takes up, including padding but not including the border, margins, or scrollbars, you want to use the Element.clientWidth and Element.clientHeight properties:
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要知道实际显示的内容占用了多少空间（包括填充，但不包括边框，边距或滚动条），则需要使用 Element.clientWidth 和 Element.clientHeight 属性：

trans-unit.source: If you need to know the actual size of the content, regardless of how much of it is currently visible, you need to use the Element.scrollWidth and Element.scrollHeight properties. These return the width and height of the entire content of an element, even if only part of it is presently visible due to the use of scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要知道内容的实际大小，而不管当前可见的内容大小，则需要使用 Element.scrollWidth 和 Element.scrollHeight 属性。它们返回元素整个内容的宽度和高度，即使由于使用滚动条，当前仅可见一部分内容。

trans-unit.source: If you need to know the total amount of space an element occupies, including the width of the visible content, scrollbars (if any), padding, and border, you want to use the HTMLElement.offsetWidth and HTMLElement.offsetHeight properties. Most of the time these are the same as width and height of Element.getBoundingClientRect(), when there aren't any transforms applied to the element. In case of transforms, the offsetWidth and offsetHeight returns the element's layout width and height, while getBoundingClientRect() returns the rendering width and height. As an example, if the element has width: 100px; and transform: scale(0.5); the getBoundingClientRect() will return 50 as the width, while offsetWidth will return 100.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要知道元素占用的空间总量，包括可见内容的宽度，滚动条（如果有），填充和边框，则可以使用 HTMLElement.offsetWidth 和 HTMLElement.offsetHeight 属性。在大多数情况下，当没有任何变换应用于元素时，它们与 Element.getBoundingClientRect() 的宽度和高度相同。如果进行转换，则 offsetWidth 和 offsetHeight 返回元素的布局宽度和高度，而 getBoundingClientRect() 返回渲染的宽度和高度。例如，如果元素的 width: 100px; 并 transform: scale(0.5); 的 getBoundingClientRect() 将返回50作为宽度，而 offsetWidth 将返回100。

trans-unit.source: If you select to pay with the BobPay demo payment provider on this merchant page, it tries to call PaymentRequest.show(), while intercepting the NOTSUPPORTEDERR exception. If this payment method is not supported, it redirects to the signup page for BobPay.
trans-unit.target: 如果您选择在此商家页面上使用BobPay演示支付提供商进行支付，则它会在拦截 NOTSUPPORTEDERR 异常时尝试调用 PaymentRequest.show() 。如果不支持此付款方式，它将重定向到BobPay的注册页面。

trans-unit.source: If you set characterDataOldValue to true, characterData is automatically assumed to be true, even if you don't expressly set it as such.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置 characterDataOldValue 至 true ， characterData 被自动认为是 true ，即使你不明确设置为这样的。

trans-unit.source: If you set either attributeFilter or attributeOldValue to true, attributes is automatically assumed to be true, even if you don't expressly set it as such.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要么设置 attributeFilter 或 attributeOldValue 至 true ， attributes 被自动认为是 true ，即使你不明确设置为这样的。

trans-unit.source: If you set the MutationObserverInit.characterData property to true but don't set characterDataOldValue to true as well, the MutationRecord will not include information describing the prior state of the text node's contents.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 MutationObserverInit.characterData 属性设置为 true ,但也未将 characterDataOldValue 设置为 true ，则 MutationRecord 将不包含描述文本节点内容的先前状态的信息。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a miterLimit value below 4.2 in this demo, none of the visible corners will join with a miter extension, but only with a small bevel near the blue lines; with a miterLimit above 10, most corners in this demo should join with a miter far away from the blue lines, and whose height is decreasing between corners from left to right because they connect with growing angles; with intermediate values, the corners on the left side will only join with a bevel near the blue lines, and the corners on the right side with a miter extension (also with a decreasing height).
trans-unit.target: 如果在此演示中将 miterLimit 值指定为低于4.2，则所有可见角都不与斜接扩展连接，而仅在蓝线附近具有小斜角；如果 miterLimit 大于10，则此演示中的大多数拐角都应与远离蓝线的斜接连接，并且由于连接的角度越来越大，其高度在从左到右的角之间逐渐减小；如果使用中间值，则左侧的角仅与靠近蓝线的斜角连接，而右侧的角具有斜接扩展名（高度也逐渐减小）。

trans-unit.source: If you try to call drawImage() before the image has finished loading, it won't do anything (or, in older browsers, may even throw an exception). So you need to be sure to use the load event so you don't try this before the image has loaded:

trans-unit.source: If you try to delete a directory which contains one or more files that can't be removed, or if an error occurs while deletion of a number of files is underway, some files may not be deleted. You should provide an errorCallback to watch for and handle this, perhaps by trying again.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试删除包含一个或多个无法删除的文件的目录，或者在删除多个文件时发生错误，则可能无法删除某些文件。您应该提供 errorCallback 来监视和处理此问题，也许可以再试一次。

trans-unit.source: If you try to open a database with a version lower than the one it already has.
trans-unit.target: 如果你试图打开一个比它已有的版本更低的数据库。

trans-unit.source: If you try to set the mode property value to segments when the initial value is sequence, an error will be thrown. The existing segment order must be maintained in sequence mode. You can, however, change the value from segments to sequence. It just means the play order will be fixed, and new timestamps generated to reflect this.
trans-unit.target: 如果您尝试在初始值为 sequence 时将 mode 属性值设置为 segments ，则会引发错误。现有的段顺序必须保持在 sequence 模式下。但是，您可以将值从 segments 更改为 sequence 。这只是意味着播放顺序将是固定的，并且会生成新的时间戳来反映这一点。

trans-unit.source: If you use a relatively large radius, the arc may appear in a place you didn't expect. In this example, the arc's connecting line goes above, instead of below, the coordinate specified by moveTo(). This happens because the radius is too large for the arc to fit entirely below the starting point.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用相对较大的半径，则圆弧可能会出现在您未曾想到的地方。在此示例中，圆弧的连接线位于 moveTo() 指定的坐标的上方，而不是下方。发生这种情况是因为半径太大，弧无法完全位于起点以下。

trans-unit.source: If you use an asynchronous XMLHttpRequest, you receive a callback when the data has been received. This lets the browser continue to work as normal while your request is being handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用异步 XMLHttpRequest ，则在收到数据后会收到回调。这样，在处理您的请求时，浏览器就可以继续正常运行。

trans-unit.source: If you use the callback to monitor these changes, you don't need to call this method. Calling this method clears the pending intersection list, so the callback will not be run.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用回调来监视这些变化,你就不需要调用这个方法。调用这个方法会清除待定的交叉点列表,所以回调不会被运行。

trans-unit.source: If you use this call above, you will get a stereo buffer with two channels, that when played back on an AudioContext running at 44100Hz (very common, most normal sound cards run at this rate), will last for 0.5 seconds: 22050 frames/44100Hz = 0.5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用上面这个调用,你将得到一个有两个通道的立体声缓冲区,当在AudioContext上以44100Hz的速度播放时(很常见,大多数普通声卡都以这个速度运行),将持续0.5秒:22050帧/44100Hz=0.5秒。

trans-unit.source: If you use this call, you will get a mono buffer (one channel), that, when played back on an AudioContext running at 44100Hz, will be automatically *resampled* to 44100Hz (and therefore yield 44100 frames), and last for 1.0 second: 44100 frames / 44100Hz = 1 second.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此调用，您将获得一个单声道缓冲区（一个通道），当在以44100Hz运行的 AudioContext 上播放时，它将自动*重新采样*至44100Hz（因此产生44100帧），并持续1.0秒：44100帧/ 44100Hz = 1秒

trans-unit.source: If you use this call, you will get a mono buffer with just one channel), that when played back on an AudioContext running at 44100Hz, will be automatically resampled to 44100Hz (and therefore yield 44100 frames), and last for 1.0 second: 44100 frames/44100Hz = 1 second.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此调用，您将获得一个只有一个通道的单声道缓冲区），当在以44100Hz运行的AudioContext上播放时，它将被自动重采样为44100Hz（因此产生44100帧），并持续1.0秒：44100帧/ 44100Hz = 1秒。

trans-unit.source: If you use this call, you will get a stereo buffer (two channels), that, when played back on an AudioContext running at 44100Hz (very common, most normal sound cards run at this rate), will last for 0.5 seconds: 22050 frames / 44100Hz = 0.5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用这个调用,你将得到一个立体声缓冲区(两个通道),当在运行在44100Hz的AudioContext上播放时(很常见,大多数普通声卡都以这个速率运行),将持续0.5秒:22050帧/44100Hz=0.5秒。

trans-unit.source: If you want to allow a drop, you must prevent the default handling by cancelling the event. You can do this either by returning false from an attribute-defined event listener, or by calling the event's preventDefault() method. The latter may be more feasible in a function defined in a separate script.
trans-unit.target: 如果要允许丢弃，则必须通过取消事件来防止默认处理。您可以通过从属性定义的事件侦听器返回 false 或调用事件的 preventDefault() 方法来执行此操作。在单独脚本中定义的函数中，后者可能更为可行。

trans-unit.source: If you want to force e10s to be on — to explicitly re-enable touch events support — you need to go to about:config and create a new Boolean preference browser.tabs.remote.force-enable. Set it to true, restart the browser, and e10s will be enabled regardless of any other settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果要强制打开e10（以明确重新启用触摸事件支持），则需要转到 about:config 并创建一个新的布尔首选项 browser.tabs.remote.force-enable 。将其设置为 true ，重新启动浏览器，并且无论其他设置如何，都将启用e10s。

trans-unit.source: If you want to play with the IIR filter node and need some values to help along the way, there's a table of already calculated values here; on pages 4 & 5 of the linked PDF the an values refer to the feedForward values and the bn values refer to the feedback. musicdsp.org is also a great resource if you want to read more about different filters and how they are implemented digitally.

trans-unit.source: If you want your server to obey certain subprotocols, then naturally you'll need extra code on the server. Let's imagine we're using a subprotocol json. In this subprotocol, all data is passed as JSON. If the client solicits this protocol and the server wants to use it, the server will need to have a JSON parser. Practically speaking, this will be part of a library, but the server will need to pass the data around.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望服务器服从某些子协议，那么自然地，您将需要服务器上的额外代码。假设我们正在使用子协议 json 。在此子协议中，所有数据均作为JSON传递。如果客户端请求此协议，并且服务器要使用它，则服务器将需要具有JSON解析器。实际上，这将是库的一部分，但是服务器将需要传递数据。

trans-unit.source: If you would like to limit the range of values you see in a cursor, you can use an IDBKeyRange object and pass it as the first argument to openCursor() or openKeyCursor(). You can make a key range that only allows a single key, or one that has a lower or upper bound, or one that has both a lower and upper bound. The bound may be "closed" (i.e., the key range includes the given value(s)) or "open" (i.e., the key range does not include the given value(s)). Here's how it works:
trans-unit.target: 如果要限制在游标中看到的值的范围，可以使用 IDBKeyRange 对象，并将其作为第一个参数传递给 openCursor() 或 openKeyCursor() 。您可以设置一个密钥范围，该范围仅允许一个键，或者一个具有下限或上限的密钥，或者一个既具有下限又具有上限的密钥。边界可以是“封闭的”（即，键范围包括给定值）或“打开的”（即，键范围不包括给定值）。运作方式如下：

trans-unit.source: If you would like to use the WebSocket API, it is useful if you have a server. In this article I will show you how to write one in C#. You can do it in any server-side language, but to keep things simple and more understandable, I chose Microsoft's language.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想使用 WebSocket API,如果您有服务器,那就很有用。在本文中,我将向您展示如何用C#编写一个服务器。您可以用任何服务器端语言来做,但为了保持简单和更易理解,我选择了微软的语言。

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to know more about how this works, read RFC 3550: RTP: A Transport Protocol for Real-Time Applications and RFC 4733: RTP Payload for DTMF Digits, Telephony Tones, and Telephony Signals. The details of how DTMF payloads are handled on RTP are beyond the scope of this article. Instead, we'll focus on how to use DTMF within the context of an RTCPeerConnection by studying how an example works.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想了解更多有关其工作原理的信息，请阅读RFC 3550：RTP：实时应用程序的传输协议和RFC 4733：DTMF数字，电话音和电话信号的RTP有效负载。如何在RTP上处理DTMF有效负载的详细信息超出了本文的范围。相反，我们将通过研究示例的工作方式，着重于如何在 RTCPeerConnection 上下文中使用DTMF 。

trans-unit.source: If your <form> element contains an element named name then that element overrides the form.name property, so that you can't access it. Internet Explorer (IE) does not allow the name attribute of an element created using createElement() to be set or modified using the name property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 <form> 元素包含一个名为name的元素，则该元素将覆盖 form.name 属性，以便您无法访问它。Internet Explorer（IE）不允许使用name属性设置或修改使用 createElement() 创建的元素的 name 属性。

trans-unit.source: If your ChannelSplitterNode always has one single input, the amount of outputs is defined by a parameter on its constructor and the call to AudioContext.createChannelSplitter(). In the case that no value is given, it will default to 6. If there are fewer channels in the input than there are outputs, supernumerary outputs are silent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 ChannelSplitterNode 始终只有一个输入，则输出量由其构造函数上的参数以及对 AudioContext.createChannelSplitter() 的调用来定义。在没有给出值的情况下，它将默认为 6 。如果输入中的通道少于输出，则多余的输出将保持静音。

trans-unit.source: If your application is running on Firefox OS, please take a look at geolocation wake lock to keep your application getting position updates while in the background or screen off.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的应用程序在Firefox OS上运行，请查看地理位置唤醒锁，以确保您的应用程序在后台或关闭屏幕时都能获取位置更新。

trans-unit.source: If your application uses canvas and doesn’t need a transparent backdrop, set the alpha option to false when creating a drawing context with HTMLCanvasElement.getContext(). This information can be used internally by the browser to optimize rendering.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的应用程序使用画布并且不需要透明背景，则在使用 HTMLCanvasElement.getContext() 创建绘图上下文时，将 alpha 选项设置为 false 。浏览器可以在内部使用此信息来优化渲染。

trans-unit.source: If your architecture doesn't necessarily have all of the data ready to go at the moment it instantiates the payment interface by calling show(), specify the detailsPromise parameter, providing a Promise that is fulfilled once the data is ready. If this is provided, show() will not allow the user to interact with the payment interface until the promise is fulfilled, so that data can be updated prior to the user engaging with the payment process.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的体系结构在通过调用 show() 实例化支付接口时并不一定要准备好所有数据，请指定 detailsPromise 参数，并提供一个在数据准备好后即可兑现的 Promise 。如果提供了此功能，则 show() 将不允许用户与支付界面进行交互，直到兑现承诺为止，以便可以在用户进行支付过程之前更新数据。

trans-unit.source: If your browser supports animationcancel, hiding the box using the button will cause a message to be displayed about the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的浏览器支持 animationcancel ，则使用按钮隐藏该框将导致显示有关该事件的消息。

trans-unit.source: If your browser supports it, you can see it live.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的浏览器支持它，则可以实时查看。

trans-unit.source: If your communication needs involve receiving event or message data from the server, consider using server-sent events through the EventSource interface. For full-duplex communication, WebSockets may be a better choice.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的通信需求涉及从服务器接收事件或消息数据，请考虑通过 EventSource 接口使用服务器发送的事件。对于全双工通信，WebSockets可能是更好的选择。

trans-unit.source: If your goal is to record camera and/or microphone input, you may wish to examine the available input devices before beginning the process of constructing the MediaRecorder. To do so, you'll need to call navigator.mediaDevices.enumerateDevices() to get a list of the available media devices. You can then examine that list and identify the potential input sources, and even filter the list based on desired criteria.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的目标是记录摄像机和/或麦克风的输入，则可能希望在开始构造 MediaRecorder 的过程之前检查可用的输入设备。为此，您需要调用 navigator.mediaDevices.enumerateDevices() 以获得可用媒体设备的列表。然后，您可以检查该列表并确定潜在的输入源，甚至可以根据所需条件过滤列表。

trans-unit.source: If your object is a text node, you can use the data attribute and retrieve the text content of the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的对象是一个文本节点,你可以使用data属性,检索该节点的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: If your server worker is active on a client being served with the Service-Worker-Allowed header, you can specify a list of max scopes for that worker.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的服务器工作程序在通过 Service-Worker-Allowed 标头提供服务的客户端上处于活动状态，则可以指定该工作程序的最大作用域列表。

trans-unit.source: If your service worker has previously been installed, but then a new version of the worker is available on refresh or page load, the new version is installed in the background, but not yet activated. It is only activated when there are no longer any pages loaded that are still using the old service worker. As soon as there are no more such pages still loaded, the new service worker activates.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的服务工作程序先前已安装,但在刷新或页面加载时有新版本的工作程序可用,则新版本会在后台安装,但尚未激活。只有当不再加载任何仍在使用旧版服务 Worker 的页面时,才会激活新版本。一旦不再有此类页面仍在加载,新的服务 Worker 就会激活。

trans-unit.source: Implementing intersection detection in the past involved event handlers and loops calling methods like Element.getBoundingClientRect() to build up the needed information for every element affected. Since all this code runs on the main thread, even one of these can cause performance problems. When a site is loaded with these tests, things can get downright ugly.
trans-unit.target: 过去实现交叉检测涉及事件处理程序，并循环调用 Element.getBoundingClientRect() 之类的方法来为每个受影响的元素建立所需的信息。由于所有这些代码都在主线程上运行，因此即使其中之一也可能导致性能问题。当一个站点加载了这些测试时，事情可能变得很丑陋。

trans-unit.source: Implements a general infinite impulse response (IIR) filter; this type of filter can be used to implement tone control devices and graphic equalizers as well.
trans-unit.target: 实现通用的无限脉冲响应（IIR）滤波器；这种类型的滤波器还可用于实现音调控制设备和图形均衡器。

trans-unit.source: Implements the document object model (DOM) representation of the font element. The HTML Font Element <font> defines the font size, font face and color of text.
trans-unit.target: 实现字体元素的文档对象模型（DOM）表示形式。HTML字体元素 <font> 定义了字体大小，字体和文本颜色。

trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个脚本导入工作人员的作用域。您可以指定任意多个，并以逗号分隔。例如： importScripts('foo.js', 'bar.js');
